 {FirstName}{daoyou}，我正在{DiDian}与其他道友交易，你若是有事可来此与我相聚。== {FirstName}{daoyou}, I am {DiDian} trading with other Daoists, you can come here and meet me if you have something to do.
 唯心，唯剑；无心，无剑。== Only the heart, only the sword; no heart, no sword.

<Title>万象图鉴</Title>\n<Image>tujian1</Image>\n万象图鉴中会可以查找到游戏中所有的草药、矿物、材料、丹药、妖兽、神通、功法和秘术以及它们的详细信息。\n\n<Title>修行要诀</Title>\n<Image>tujian2</Image>\n修行要诀中能查看到各种与游戏系统、玩法和操作有关的所有信息。==<Title>Wanxiang Tujian</Title>\n<Image>tujian1</Image>\nWanxiang Tujian will be able to find all the herbs, minerals, materials, potions, demonic beasts, magical powers, feats and secret arts in the game and their detailed information. \n\n<Title>Cultivation Tips</Title>\n<Image>tujian2</Image>\nThe Cultivation Tips will be able to view all kinds of information related to the game system, gameplay and operation.
<Title>丹方</Title>\n<Image>liandan1</Image>\n游戏中各处都可以看到有人在出售丹方，购买丹方后在物品栏中右键使用就可以学会这个丹方了。\n学会后的丹方会自动显示在炼丹界面中，也可以在图鉴-万象图鉴-丹药中找到对应的丹药查看。\n<Image>liandan2</Image>\n\n<Title>丹炉</Title>\n<Image>liandan3</Image>\n在游戏中，你可以购买到丹炉。\n丹炉有不同的品阶之分。\n每次炼丹都会消耗丹炉的耐久。\n如果用低阶的丹炉炼制更高阶的丹药，会额外消耗丹炉耐久。\n另外更高阶的丹炉可以在一次炼丹过程中放入更多的草药。\n\n<Title>炼丹</Title>\n炼丹先要寻到一处地火房，通常而言，各大主城的城主府还有门派的炼丹房都有地火房。\n和当地的管事对话租借地火房就可以开始炼丹了。\n<Image>liandan4</Image>\n第一步放置丹炉\n<Image>liandan5</Image>\n选择丹炉后可以直接选择丹方，如果丹方中的药材齐全的话，就可以点击丹方自动放入药材了。\n<Image>liandan6</Image>\n此时点击开始炼丹。\n<Image>liandan7</Image>\n可以选择这次炼制的丹药数量，花费一定时间后就可以炼制成功。\n<Image>liandan8</Image>\n\n<Title>药性</Title>\n<Image>liandan9</Image>\n炼丹其实不仅仅是简单的材料合成，每种药材都有主药、辅药、药引三种药性。\n当你在主药的位置炼制过这类药材后，就会解锁对应药材的主药药性，以此类推。\n\n<Title>自创丹方</Title>\n在炼制一种丹药，并且知晓这种丹药所需的药性后，就可以尝试自创丹方了。\r\n炼丹讲究的是药性药力和寒热平衡，首先满足主药和辅药的药性和药力，之后再尝试通过药引调节寒热平衡，就可以成功自创丹方。\r\n<Image>liandan10</Image>\n自创丹方时可以通过点击丹炉的药材槽位放置药材，可以再次点击相应槽位更换药材，也可以点击右键移除药材。\n<Image>liandan11</Image>\n在主动放置药材后，点击开始炼丹。\n<Image>liandan12</Image>\n炼丹成功，此时多余的药渣代表着药力溢出，可以在下次炼丹时调整丹方以节约药材。\r\n于此同时，丹方列表中也会自动添加上你刚刚自创的丹方。\r\n<Image>liandan13</Image>==<Title>Dan Recipe</Title>\n<Image>liandan1</Image>\nYou can see people selling dan recipes everywhere in the game. After buying a dan recipe, right click on the item bar to use it to learn the recipe. \nAfter learning the elixir, it will be automatically displayed in the alchemy interface, and you can also find the corresponding elixir to view in the icon - Wanxiang icon - elixir. \n<Image>liandan2</Image>\n\n<Title>Dan Furnace</Title>\n<Image>liandan3</Image>\nIn the game, you can buy dan furnaces. \nThere are different grades of dan furnaces. \nEach time you make a potion, the durability of the furnace is consumed. \nIf you use a lower-ranked furnace to refine a higher-ranked potion, it will consume additional furnace durability. \nAlso higher-ranked furnaces can put in more herbs during one elixir. \n\n<Title>Alchemy</Title>\nThe first thing you need to do is to find a ground fire room. Usually, there are ground fire rooms in the alchemy rooms of the city lord's mansions and sects in major main cities. The \n and the local steward to talk to rent the ground fire room can start alchemy. \n<Image>liandan4</Image>\nThe first step is to place the furnace \n<Image>liandan5</Image>\nAfter selecting the furnace, you can directly select the recipe, and if the recipe has all the herbs, you can click on the recipe to put the herbs in automatically. \n<Image>liandan6</Image>\nClick to start alchemy at this point. \n<Image>liandan7</Image>\nYou can choose the number of elixirs to be refined this time, and you can refine them successfully after spending a certain amount of time. \n<Image>liandan8</Image>\n\n<Title>Materia Medica</Title>\n<Image>liandan9</Image>\nAlchemy is actually more than just simple material synthesis, each herb has three kinds of medicinal properties: main, auxiliary, and remedy. \nWhen you have refined such herbs at the location of the main herbs, you will unlock the main herbal potency of the corresponding herbs, and so on. \r\n<Title>Create your own elixir</Title> \nAfter refining an elixir and knowing the medicinal properties needed for this elixir, you can try to create your own elixir. \r\nPotential and cold-heat balance are important in refining Elixirs. First, satisfying the medicinal properties and potency of the main and auxiliary medicines, and then trying to adjust the cold-heat balance through the medicinal guide afterwards, you can successfully create your own elixir. \r\n<Image>liandan10</Image>\nWhen creating your own elixir recipe, you can place the herbs by clicking on the herb slots of the elixir furnace, you can click on the corresponding slots again to change the herbs, or you can click on the right button to remove the herbs. \n<Image>liandan11</Image>\nAfter actively placing herbs, click to start alchemy. \n<Image>liandan12</Image>\nThe alchemy is successful. At this point, the excess dregs represent the overflow of medicinal power, and the recipe can be adjusted to save medicinal materials during the next alchemy. \r\nAt the same time, the Dan recipe you just created will be automatically added to the Dan recipe list. \r\n<Image>liandan13</Image>
<Title>丹药</Title>\n<Image>danyao1</Image>\n\n<Title>丹药的分类</Title>\n丹药按照使用的场景区分有永久生效的丹药，战斗用丹药，回复用丹药和突破用秘药。\n\n<Title>丹药的耐药性</Title>\r\n每种丹药都有自己独立的耐药性，服用丹药后会使耐药性增加，当耐药性达到上限后，就不可以再使用这种丹药了。\n\r\n<Title>丹毒</Title>\n每种丹药都有自己的丹毒数值，服用丹药产生效果的同时，也会增加你身体中丹毒的积累。\r\n当丹毒小于20时，身体健康：现在的你身体健康，即使一丝丝细微的丹毒存在，对你也不会有什么影响，此时丹毒每年自行减少2点。\r\n当丹毒大于20时，身体无碍：些许丹毒，并无大碍。此时丹毒每年自行减少2点。\r\n当丹毒大于50时，稍有不适：丹毒入体，对体内灵气的运转产生了略微的影响。每回合抽牌数-1，此时丹毒每年自行减少1点。\r\n当丹毒大于70时，筋脉凝滞：丹毒侵染了你的筋脉，体内灵气的运转开始凝滞。每回合抽牌数-2，此时丹毒将不会自行减少。\r\n当丹毒大于100时，病入膏肓：毒入五脏，运气行脉不能自如，每回合抽牌数-2，每次施放法术有50%的几率失败，并失去30点生命值。此时丹毒将不会自行减少。\r\n当丹毒等于120时，毒发身亡：无药可救，毒发身亡。==<Title>Drugs</Title>\n<Image>danyao1</Image>\n\n<Title>Categories of Elixirs</Title>\nDans are distinguished according to the scenario in which they are used: Dans with permanent effect, Dans for battle, Dans for recovery and Secret Dans for breakthrough. \n\n<Title>Drug resistance of elixirs</Title>\r\nEach kind of elixir has its own independent drug resistance, taking the elixir will make the drug resistance increase, when the drug resistance reaches the upper limit, you can't use this elixir anymore. \n\r\n<Title>Elixir Poison</Title>\nEach elixir has its own value of Elixir Poison, and taking the elixir to produce its effect will also increase the accumulation of Elixir Poison in your body. \r\nWhen Elixir Poison is less than 20, your body is healthy: now you are healthy, even if a tiny bit of Elixir Poison exists, it will have no effect on you, and at this time, Elixir Poison decreases by 2 points per year on its own. \r\nWhen Elixir Poison is greater than 20, the body is not affected: a little Elixir Poison, there is no big problem. At this time, Elixir Poison decreases 2 points per year by itself. \r\nWhen Elixir Poison is greater than 50, there is a slight discomfort: Elixir Poison enters the body and has a slight effect on the operation of the aura in the body. The number of cards drawn per turn is -1, at which point Elixir Poison decreases by 1 point per year on its own. \r\nWhen Elixir Poison is greater than 70, tendon stagnation: Elixir Poison has infested your tendons and veins, and the operation of your body's aura begins to stagnate. Draw -2 cards per turn, at which point Elixir Poison will not be reduced by itself. \r\nWhen the poison is greater than 100, the disease will become very serious: the poison has entered the five organs, and you cannot move your veins freely, so you will draw -2 cards per turn, have a 50% chance of failing each time you cast a spell, and lose 30 life points. At this time, Elixir Poison will not reduce by itself. \r\nWhen Elixir Poison equals 120, Poisoned Death: There is no medicine to save you, and you die of poison.
<Title>主界面</Title>\n<Image>zhujiemian</Image>\n1. 人物头像——点击头像可以打开游戏菜单-人物属性界面\n2. 神秘铁剑——点击可与魏无极交流\n3. 传音符——打开传音符功能\n4. 图鉴——打开图鉴功能\n5. 任务——打开任务界面==<Title>Main Interface</Title>\n<Image>zhujiemian</Image>\n1. Character avatar - Click on the avatar to open the game menu - character attributes interface\n2. Mysterious iron sword - - Click on it to communicate with Wei Wuji -Click it to communicate with Wei Wuji\n3. Sound transferring talisman -Open the sound transferring talisman function\n4. Picture identification -Open the picture identification function\n5. -Open the mission interface
<Title>交易</Title>\n<Image>jiaoyi1</Image>\n你可以与游戏中的任意可交互的人物交易\n交易依旧可以使用拖动和右键来移动物品，你的物品可以移动到出售栏中，而对方的物品可以移动到收购栏中。\n同时还可以使用快捷键“ctrl+右键”快速移动这组的所有物品，快捷键“shift+右键”快速移动这组中的5件物品。\n\n<Title>交易的差价</Title>\n<Image>jiaoyi2</Image>\n交易中的买入卖出价格是不同的，通常而言，卖出的价格仅有买入价格的50%。\n\n<Title>对方的兴趣</Title>\n<Image>jiaoyi3</Image>\n在交易中可以查看对方的兴趣，这场交易中的价格也会根据对方的兴趣而有所变化。\n对方感兴趣的物品会在物品详情的价格位置以红色价格标记。\n\n<Title>产地与物价</Title>\n<Image>jiaoyi4</Image>\n当你当前的交易地点并不出产这件物品的时候，这件物品会被定义为本地的稀缺物品，价格会随着与产地距离的增加而不断上涨。\n受到稀缺加成的物品会在物品详情的价格位置以红色价格标记。==<Title>Trading</Title>\n<Image>jiaoyi1</Image>\nYou can trade with any interactable character in the game \nTrading still allows you to use drag and right click to move items, your items can be moved to the sell bar and the other party's items can be moved to the buy bar. \nYou can also use the shortcut key 'ctrl+right click' to quickly move all the items in the group, and the shortcut key 'shift+right click' to quickly move 5 items in the group. \n\n<Title>The difference between the price of a transaction</Title>\n<Image>jiaoyi2</Image>\nThe buy and sell prices in a transaction are different, and usually the sell price is only 50% of the buy price. \n\n<Title>Other party's interest</Title>\n<Image>jiaoyi3</Image>\nYou can check the other party's interest in the deal, and the price in this deal will change according to the other party's interest. \nThe items that the other party is interested in will be marked with a red price in the price position of the item details. \n<Title>Origins and Prices</Title>\n<Image>jiaoyi4</Image>\nWhen your current trade location does not produce the item, the item will be defined as a local scarce item and the price will keep increasing with the distance from the origin. \nItems that are subject to the scarcity bonus will be marked with a red price in the price position of the item details.
<Title>交谈</Title>\n<Image>jiaotan1</Image>\n点击交谈就可以与游戏中的人物对话，第一次对话可以获得一个初始的好感度，这次增加的初始好感度与你在此地域的声望相关。\n你可以与人物对话询问获得任务，也可以询问一些和修练有关的问题，当你与一个游戏人物关系达到熟悉后，就可以留下传音符印记，之后此游戏人物就会出现在你的传音符列表中。==<Title>Talking</Title>\n<Image>jiaotan1</Image>\nClick Talk to talk to a character in the game. The first time you talk, you can get an initial favorability rating, and this time the initial favorability rating increase is related to your reputation in this territory. \nYou can talk to a character to ask about getting a quest, or you can ask some questions related to cultivation. When you reach a familiar relationship with a game character, you can leave a transmutation mark, and after that this game character will appear in your transmutation list.
<Title>人物列表</Title>\n<Image>renwuliebiao1</Image>\n如果当前地点有其它人物时，人物列表会自动弹出。\n人物列表中展示了人物的名字，身份，与你之间的好感度状态。\n如果人物处于需要帮助的状态，会在头像旁边显示一个任务图标。\n鼠标左键点击人物人物时就可以打开人物交互的主界面了。\n<Title>互动界面</Title>\n<Image>renwuliebiao2</Image>==<Title>Character list</Title>\n<Image>renwuliebiao1</Image>\nThe character list will pop up automatically if there are other characters in the current location. \nThe character list shows the character's name, identity, and goodness status with you. \nIf the character is in a state that needs help, a task icon will be displayed next to the avatar. \nThe main interface of character interaction is opened when the left mouse button clicks on the character's person. \n<Title>Interaction interface</Title>\n<Image>renwuliebiao2</Image>
<Title>任务</Title>\r\n<Image>renwu1</Image>\n任务界面能显示所有正在进行中的剧情任务。\r\n可以看到任务有剩余时间，若超过了剩余时间，那么任务便会过期。\r\n过期和已完成的任务可以在旧时处查看。\r\n\n<Title>传闻</Title>\r\n<Image>renwu2</Image>\n传闻界面显示了所有获取的消息和情报。\r\n对于会重复的事件，传闻中会显示下次举行的事件。\r\n而对于不会重复的情报，在超过剩余事件后便会消失。\n\n<Title>委托</Title>\r\n<Image>renwu3</Image>\n委托界面显示了所有你接受后正在进行的委托任务。\r\n游戏中，你可以从各种势力处接受到一些委托任务，完成这些委托任务可以获得比较稳定的奖励。==<Title>Quests</Title>\r\n<Image>renwu1</Image>\nThe quest interface can display all the ongoing plot quests. \r\nYou can see that the quests have time left, and if the time left is exceeded, then the quests will expire. \r\nExpired and completed quests can be viewed at the old time. \r\n\n<Title>Rumors</Title>\r\n<Image>renwu2</Image>\nThe rumor screen shows all the acquired news and intelligence. \r\nFor events that will be repeated, the rumor screen shows the next event to be held. \r\nAnd for intelligence that will not be repeated, it disappears after more than the remaining events. \n\n<Title>Commissioning</Title>\r\n<Image>renwu3</Image>\nThe commissioning screen shows all the tasks that are being commissioned after you accept them. \r\nThe game has a number of commissioned tasks that you can accept from various forces, and completing them can lead to more stable rewards.
<Title>传音符</Title>\r\n<Image>chuanyinfu1</Image>\n在你与熟悉的道友互相留下传音符印记后，就可以在传音符的列表中看到对方了。\r\n你的道友在会通过传音符向你赠送礼品，发送情报，或是需求一些物品。\r\n当你及时给你的道友提供他所需的物品后，你还可以获得一些好感度和情分的奖励。\r\n<Image>chuanyinfu2</Image>\n同时你也可以通过主动询问对方“最近所忙何事？”来获得对方当前所在的位置。\r\n你也可以通过标记功能高亮你认为重要的好友，标记后的好友可以通过列表上方的筛选功能筛选出来。==<Title>Transmitting Talisman</Title> \r\n<Image>chuanyinfu1</Image> \nAfter you and your familiar daoist friends leave each other the impression of the transmitting talisman, you can see each other in the list of the transmitting talisman. \r\nYour daoist friend in will give you gifts, send intelligence, or demand some items through the sound transmission talisman. \r\nWhen you give your daoist friend the items he needs in time, you can also get some rewards for goodwill and love points. \r\n<Image>chuanyinfu2</Image>\nYou can also get the current location of your friend by asking him 'What are you up to these days?' to get their current location. \r\nYou can also highlight the friends you think are important through the marker function, and the marked friends can be filtered out through the filter function at the top of the list.
<Title>修炼</Title>\r\n<Image>biguan1</Image>\r\n闭关修炼是积攒修为的主要方式。\r\n你可以拖动进度条决定闭关的时间。\r\n单次闭关修炼的时间上限为20年。\r\n若你距离下次突破境界（包括小境界和大境界）的时间小于20年，那么这次闭关时间的上限就由你到达当前境界所能容纳的修为值所需要的时间决定。\r\n\r\n影响闭关修炼速度的属性分别为主修功法，资质，地脉和心境。\r\n其中主修功法决定了修炼速度的基础，资质会对主修功法的修炼速度进行加成，并获得一个基础修炼速度，这个基础修炼速度会随着时间自行运转积累，增加修为。\r\n闭关时，会根据基础修炼速度进行额外加成。\r\n其中地脉的灵气浓度会直接对修炼速度增幅，而心境则会不同程度地影响修炼效率。\r\n每个修仙的大境界都需要一个基础的心境状态，其中\r\n炼气对应神静气安；\r\n筑基对应古井不波；\r\n金丹对应六情沉寂；\r\n元婴对应看破红尘；\r\n化神对应高超物外。\r\n若心境状态低于境界需求，那么闭关修炼时所获得的修为值会降低50%。\r\n若心境状态达到境界需求，那么闭关修炼时就可以获得所有修为值。\r\n若心境状态高于境界需求，那么闭关修炼时就可以额外获得20%的修为值。==<Title>Cultivation</Title> \r\n<Image>biguan1</Image> \r\nCloseted cultivation is the main way to accumulate cultivation. \r\nYou can drag the progress bar to decide the duration of the retreat. \r\nThe time limit for a single retreat is 20 years. \r\nIf you have less than 20 years until your next realm breakthrough （including minor and major realms）, then the maximum amount of time for this retreat is determined by how long it takes you to reach the cultivation value that your current realm can hold. \r\nThe attributes that affect the speed of retreat cultivation are the main cultivation technique, Aptitude, earth pulse and state of mind. \r\nIn which the main cultivation technique determines the basis of the cultivation speed, the Aptitude will add to the cultivation speed of the main cultivation technique and obtain a base cultivation speed, this base cultivation speed will run itself to accumulate with time and increase the cultivation. \r\nThe additional bonus will be based on the base cultivation speed when you are in seclusion. \r\nIn which the concentration of spiritual energy of the earth veins will directly increase on the cultivation speed, while the state of mind will affect the cultivation efficiency to varying degrees. \r\nEach major realm of immortal cultivation requires a basic state of mind, of which \r\n refining qi corresponds to divine stillness and peace; \r\n foundation building corresponds to ancient wells without waves; \r\n Golden Core corresponds to six feelings of silence; \r\n Nascent Soul corresponds to seeing through the red; \r\n Deityfication corresponds to high transcendent things. \r\nIf the state of mind is lower than the realm requirement, then the cultivation value obtained during the retreat will be reduced by 50%. \r\nIf the state of mind reaches the realm requirement, then all the cultivation values are obtained during the retreat cultivation. \r\nIf the state of mind is higher than the realm requirement, then an additional 20% of the cultivation value is gained when retreating to cultivate.
<Title>出海</Title>\n<Image>chuhai1</Image>\n你可以在广陵城的港口点击右下角的出海按钮出海。\n但是在出海前千万别忘了找港口的船夫购买海图和灵舟。\n\n<Title>海图</Title>\n<Image>chuhai2</Image>\n海图上颜色越深的海域，危险等级越高。\n\n<Title>海上的行动方式</Title>\n在海上，你可以通过拖动鼠标移动视角，也可以通过滚轮缩放视野范围。\n人物则是通过键盘的WASD键移动。\n移动方式分为游泳（没有装备飞行遁术和灵舟时），飞行（装备飞行遁术但没有装备灵舟时）和驾船（装备灵舟时）。\n<Image>chuhai3</Image>\n其中游泳的速度最慢，飞行每走一步消耗的时间与遁速相关，驾船每走一步消耗的时间与灵舟等级相关。\n\n<Title>灵气乱流</Title>\r\n<Image>chuhai4</Image>\n在无尽之海上，我们经常可以看到这些不同颜色不同形状的雾状物体。\r\n这些就是无尽之海上狂暴的灵气所产生的灵气乱流，这些乱流会随着时间不断移动。\r\n灵气乱流的颜色越深，就代表这个灵气乱流的狂暴程度越高。\r\n如果你通过游泳或是飞行穿过灵气乱流，在你行动的同时，会不断扣除人物的气血，灵气乱流的狂暴程度越高，造成的伤害也就越高。\r\n灵舟能够在无尽之海上提供额外的防护能力，如果你驾船经过灵气乱流，那么仅会扣除灵舟的耐久（灵舟上方的血条是灵舟当前的耐久），灵舟的品阶越高，能够提供的防护能力也就越高，高品阶的灵舟甚至可以无视一些低强度的灵气乱流。\r\n另外，当前版本的灵舟暂时无法修复，所以出海时请尽可能地带足灵舟，以备不时之需。\n\r\n<Title>视野范围和海兽</Title>\r\n<Image>chuhai5</Image>\n在海上行动时，可以看到人物周围有一片高亮区域，这是人物的视野范围。\r\n这个视野范围的大小由神识决定，神识越高，视野范围越大。\r\n在海上可以时不时地看到几个漩涡，这些漩涡就代表了一只海兽，海上的海兽受狂暴的灵气影响通常体型巨大但是行动缓慢，巨大的体型给他们带来更高血量的同时，也让它们能够产出更多的材料。\r\n海兽会根据你的境界决定自己的行动逻辑，当你的境界低于海兽或与之相仿，海兽会倾向于追杀你，当你的境界高于海兽，海兽就会四散而逃。\r\n\n<Title>海上城市</Title>\r\n在海图上，可以看到四个有名称的岛屿，这四个岛屿有稳定的灵气环境，也是海上修士们固定聚集的地点。\r\n在这些城市里，你可以安全地休息补给。\r\n而这些城市中也有自己的势力，也有坊市和拍卖会这些便于修士们互通有无的地点。\r\n在这些城市的港口，你也可能遇到正要出海的修士，你可以和他们一同出海搭个便船，省去在海上的奔波。\r\n\n<Title>视野范围和海兽</Title>\r\n<Image>chuhai6</Image>\n在海上，你还会遇到一些岛屿和其它船只。\r\n你可以追上那些船只，与船上的人交互。\r\n当你的船只停靠在岛屿上时，你可以在船舱的房间内闭关。\r\n也可以进入岛屿副本开始一次探索。==<Title>Going to sea</Title>\n<Image>chuhai1</Image>\nYou can go to sea by clicking the Go to sea button at the bottom right corner of the port in Guangling City. \nBut don't forget to find the boatman at the port to buy the chart and spirit boat before going to sea. \n\n<Title>Chart</Title>\n<Image>chuhai2</Image>\nThe darker the color of the sea on the chart, the higher the danger level. \n\n<Title>Movement at sea</Title>\nAt sea, you can move the viewpoint by dragging the mouse, and you can also zoom the field of view with the scroll wheel. \nThe character, on the other hand, is moved by the WASD keys of the keyboard. \nMovement methods are divided into swimming （when no flying recluse and spirit boat are equipped）, flying （when flying recluse is equipped but no spirit boat is equipped） and sailing （when spirit boat is equipped）. \n<Image>chuhai3</Image>\nThe speed of swimming is the slowest, the time consumed for each step of flying is related to the speed of recluse, and the time consumed for each step of sailing is related to the level of spirit boat. \n\n<Title>Aura Turbulence</Title>\r\n<Image>chuhai4</Image>\nIn the Endless Sea, we can often see these fog-like objects of different colors and shapes. \r\nThese are the aura turbulence generated by the raging aura on the Endless Sea, and these turbulences will keep moving with time. \r\nThe darker the color of the aura turbulence, the higher the level of rage of this aura turbulence. \r\nIf you swim or fly through the aura turbulence, the character's Life will be continuously deducted while you move, and the higher the rage level of the aura turbulence, the higher the damage done. \r\n Spirit boats can provide extra protection on the Endless Sea. If you drive your boat through the aura turbulence, only the durability of the boat will be deducted （the Life bar above the boat is the current durability of the boat）, and the higher the rank of the boat, the higher the protection it can provide. \r\nIn addition, the current version of the spirit boat cannot be repaired for the time being, so please bring as much spirit boat as possible when you go out to sea, just in case. \n\r\n<Title>Scope of vision and sea animals</Title>\r\n<Image>chuhai5</Image>\nWhen moving at sea, you can see a highlighted area around the character, which is the character's scope of vision. \r\nThe size of this field of view is determined by divine knowledge, the higher the divine knowledge, the larger the field of view. \r\nSeveral whirlpools can be seen at sea from time to time, these whirlpools represent a sea beast, sea beasts affected by the raging aura are usually huge but slow moving, their huge size gives them higher Life volume and at the same time allows them to produce more materials. The \r\n sea beasts will decide their action logic according to your realm, when your realm is lower than the sea beasts or similar to it, the sea beasts will tend to chase you, when your realm is higher than the sea beasts, the sea beasts will scatter and flee. \r\n\n<Title>Sea Cities</Title>\r\nOn the sea map, you can see four islands with names, which have a stable aura environment and are the regular gathering places for the sea cultivators. \r\nIn these cities, you can rest and resupply safely. \r\nAnd these cities also have their own forces, as well as workshops and auctions which are convenient locations for cultivators to interchange. \r\nIn the ports of these cities, you may also meet cultivators who are about to go to sea, and you can go with them to take a ride on the boat to save yourself from running around at sea. \r\n\n<Title>Scope of vision and sea beasts</Title>\r\n<Image>chuhai6</Image>\n In the sea, you will also encounter some islands and other ships. \r\nYou can catch up with those ships and interact with the people on board. \r\nWhen your ship is docked on an island, you can retreat in the cabin room. \r\nYou can also enter a copy of the island to start an exploration.
<Title>初窥门径</Title>\n炼器一道，非常讲究经验和知识。\n只有器道感悟足够，才能够控制灵气炼制成器，每一个大道境界都对应一个法宝等级。\n在无人教导的情况下很难入门，但是也可以先行购买一本炼器入门，领悟达到初窥门径后再开始炼器。\n<Image>lianqi1</Image>\n\n<Title>准备材料</Title>\n<Image>lianqi2</Image>\n炼器自然需要准备炼器的材料。\n炼器的材料除了品阶外有两个状态，分别为它的种类和属性。\n种类分别为金属、石、牙骨、皮鳞、灵武，这些种类决定了这个材料的“韧性、坚固、亲和、灵性和操控”，我们称之为五维。\n而属性分别有“金木水火土气神剑”，在这其中又再分了阴阳，不同属性的材料会给法宝带来不同的效果。\n\n<Title>开始炼制</Title>\n和炼丹一样，炼器同样需要一个炼器室。\n在一些城市的城主府或者门派的神兵阁，与执事事对话租借炼器室就可以开始炼器了。\n\n<Title>选择器型</Title>\n<Image>lianqi3</Image>\n炼器的第一步是选择这次想要炼制的法宝。\n不同型制的法宝都有自己特殊的作用，反映在炼器之上，就是同样的材料如果炼制成不同的法宝，也会有不同的效果。\n\n<Title>放入材料</Title>\n<Image>lianqi4</Image>\n炼制一件法宝需要消耗10件材料，通过点击对应的槽位就可以添加材料。\n\n<Title>关注五维</Title>\n<Image>lianqi5</Image>\n在放入材料的同时，我们可以看到左边的初始灵气和五维都在不断增长。\n材料的品阶决定了材料的灵气值。\n材料的种类决定了材料的五维，当我们看到总灵力小于初始灵力时，说明了此时五维的属性不平衡，材料的部分灵力被浪费在平衡五维上。\n所以放置材料时首先要关注的就是五维的平衡，确保能最大化地利用材料的灵力。\n通常而言，五维的上限是500，而若是五维之和超过2200，那么就不会有灵力被浪费。\n\n<Title>查看效果</Title>\n<Image>lianqi6</Image>\n在平衡五维后，就可以查看这次炼器能够产生的基础效果了，你可以尝试不同的器型材料搭配，以产生不同的效果。\n\n<Title>选择灵纹</Title>\r\n<Image>lianqi7</Image>\n最后一步，你可以选择你已经获得的大道天赋中的炼器灵纹对法宝进行加强。\r\n通常这些灵纹会增加灵力的数量，但也会对使用者有更高的要求或是会对使用者产生负面效果。\r\n\n<Title>铭刻成器</Title>\n<Image>lianqi8</Image>\n若是一切正常的话，就可以消耗一定的时间铭刻成器了，最后你还可以为自己炼制的法宝取一个有趣的名字。==<Title>First glimpse of the path</Title> \nThe weapon refining dish is very much about experience and knowledge. \nOnly if one has enough sense of the weapon dao can one control the aura to refine into a weapon, and each dao realm corresponds to a magic treasure level. \nIt's hard to get started without being taught, but you can also buy an introduction to refining first and comprehend to reach the first glimpse before you start refining. \n<Image>lianqi1</Image>\n\n<Title>Preparing Materials</Title>\n<Image>lianqi2</Image>\n\n refining naturally requires the preparation of refining materials. \nThe material for refining weapons has two states besides the grade, which are its kind and properties. \nThe types are metal, stone, tooth and bone, skin and scales, and spiritual martial arts. These types determine the 'toughness, strength, affinity, spirituality, and control' of the material, which we call the five dimensions. \nAnd the attributes are 'metal, wood, water, fire, earth, gas, divine sword', in which there is a further division of yin and yang, different attributes of the material will bring different effects to the magic treasure. \n\n<Title>Start refining</Title>\nLike alchemy, weapon refining also requires a refining room. \nIn some cities, you can start refining by renting a refining room at the city lord's residence or the divine weapons pavilion of a sect and talking to the deacon. \n\n<Title>Selecting the weapon type</Title>\n<Image>lianqi3</Image>\nThe first step of weapon refining is to select the magic treasure you want to refine this time. \nDifferent types of magic treasures have their own special effects, which are reflected in the refining of weapons, that is, the same material will have different effects if refined into different magic treasures. \n\n<Title>Put in materials</Title>\n<Image>lianqi4</Image>\nIt takes 10 pieces of materials to refine a magic treasure, and you can add materials by clicking the corresponding slots. \n\n<Title>Focus on the five dimensions</Title>\n<Image>lianqi5</Image>\nWhile putting in materials, we can see the initial aura and the five dimensions on the left are growing. \nThe grade of the material determines the aura value of the material. \nThe type of material determines the five dimensions of the material. When we see that the total spiritual energy is less than the initial spiritual energy, it means that the properties of the five dimensions are not balanced at this time, and some of the spiritual energy of the material is wasted on balancing the five dimensions. \nSo the first thing to focus on when placing materials is the balance of the five dimensions, to ensure that you can maximize the use of the material's spiritual power. \nUsually, the upper limit of the five dimensions is 500, and if the sum of the five dimensions exceeds 2200, then no spiritual energy will be wasted. \n\n<Title>View the effect</Title>\n<Image>lianqi6</Image>\nAfter balancing the five dimensions, you can view the base effect that can be produced by this refinement, and you can try different weapon type material combinations to produce different effects. \n\n<Title>Selecting the spirit pattern</Title>\r\n<Image>lianqi7</Image>\nIn the last step, you can select the refining spirit pattern of the Daodao talent you have acquired to enhance the magic treasure. \r\nUsually these spirit patterns will increase the amount of spirit power, but they will also be more demanding or will have a negative effect on the user. \r\n\n<Title>Inscribing into a weapon</Title>\n<Image>lianqi8</Image>\nIf everything is fine, you can consume a certain amount of time to inscribe into a weapon, and finally you can make an interesting name for the magic treasure you refined.
<Title>副本探索</Title>\n<Image>fuben1</Image>\n副本是游戏中的重要探索内容之一。\n进入副本后，只会显示出你当前位置旁两格的路径。\n其中靠近地图边缘的是离开点，必须要到达这个点后才可以从副本中离开。\n和大地图一样，可以点击你当前位置旁的地点图标移动，另外也可以通过键盘的WASD移动，同样，空格键可以锁定到人物当前所在的位置。\n<Image>fuben2</Image>\n而随着你的前进，会不断探索出更多的地点图标和可行动路径，其中可能会遇到妖兽、奇遇、天材地宝和其它秘境。==<Title>Copy Exploration</Title>\n<Image>fuben1</Image>\nCopy is one of the important exploration contents in the game. \nAfter entering a copy, only the path two squares next to your current location will be shown. \nOne of them, near the edge of the map, is the departure point, which must be reached before you can leave from the copy. \nLike the big map, you can click on the location icon next to your current position to move around, and additionally you can also move around via the keyboard's WASD, and again, the spacebar can be locked to the character's current location. \n<Image>fuben2</Image>\nAnd as you move forward, you will continue to explore more location icons and actionable paths, where you may encounter demonic beasts, strange encounters, heavenly treasures and other secret places.
<Title>功法</Title>\n<Image>gongfa1</Image>\n在游戏中可以通过各种方式获得功法，通过闭关领悟获得功法后，就会在功法列表中显示。\n习得的功法只有通过拖动装备到主修和辅修还有遁术栏中才会生效。\n其中只有主修功法会影响修炼速度，而辅修功法并不会对修炼速度产生影响。==<Title>Gongfa</Title>\n<Image>gongfa1</Image>\nGongfa can be acquired in various ways in the game, and after acquiring gongfa through closed-door comprehension, it will be shown in the gongfa list. \nThe acquired feats will only take effect by dragging and equipping them to the main and auxiliary cultivation and the recluse column. \nIn which only the main cultivation feats will affect the cultivation speed, while the auxiliary cultivation feats will not have an effect on the cultivation speed.
<Title>化神</Title>\n敬请期待==<Title>God Transformation</Title> \nStay tuned
<Title>地域声望</Title>\n<Image>shengwang1</Image>\n声望界面展示了你在不同地域的声望数值。\n声望通常可以通过完成当地重要事件和完成当地势力的任务提高。\n声望的数值会影响你的声望状态。\n声望小于-500时：臭名昭著\n声望小于-50时：声名狼藉\n声望小于-10时：名声败坏\n声望大于-10时：默默无闻\n声望大于50时：略有薄名\n声望大于500时：声名远扬\n声望大于1000时：誉满天下\n而不同的声望状态也会影响不同地域对你进行的行为，将鼠标移动到对应声望状态可以查看对应状态下的效果。\n\n<Title>悬赏系统</Title>\n<Image>shengwang2</Image>\n当你在某个地域的声望低于声名狼藉时，相应地域便会对你发出悬赏，声望越低赏金越高。\n此时，风雨阁会依次派出各个境界的杀手前来追杀你，赏金越高，越容易吸引到更强的杀手。\n若是风雨阁认为追杀你的代价远高于赏金，他们也会偃旗息鼓，不再尝试完成悬赏。==<Title>Regional Reputation</Title>\n<Image>shengwang1</Image>\nThe Reputation screen shows the value of your reputation in different regions. \nReputation can usually be increased by completing important local events and completing quests for local powers. The value of \n reputation affects your reputation status. \nPrestige less than -500: infamous \nPrestige less than -50: infamous \nPrestige less than -10: infamous \nPrestige greater than -10: obscure \nPrestige greater than 50: slightly infamous \nPrestige greater than 500: infamous \nPrestige greater than 1000: famous \nAnd different prestige statuses also affect different The behavior performed on you by the territory, move the mouse to the corresponding prestige status can view the effect of the corresponding state. \n\n<Title>Bounty system</Title>\n<Image>shengwang2</Image>\nWhen your reputation in a certain region is lower than Reputation, the corresponding region will issue a bounty on you, the lower the reputation the higher the bounty. \nAt this time, the Rain and Wind Pavilion will send assassins from each realm in turn to hunt you down, and the higher the bounty, the easier it is to attract stronger assassins. \nIf the Rain and Wind Pavilion thinks the cost of hunting you down is much higher than the bounty, they will also cave in and stop trying to complete the bounty.
<Title>基本属性</Title>\n<Image>shuxing1</Image>\n年龄和寿元：寿元表示了人物所能达到的年龄上限\n资质：决定修练的速度，资质越高，基础修炼速度受到的加成越高\n悟性：决定闭关时感悟思绪、领悟新神通功法、突破功法时的效率\n神识：除了会对战斗产生影响外，还会在各种需要判定神识的地方产生作用。\n遁速：决定人物的移动速度，战斗时的先手和战斗时能否成功逃跑\n修炼速度：人物当前每月被动积攒的修为值，这个数值由人物的资质和主修功法决定\n\n<Title>人物状态</Title>\n<Image>shuxing2</Image>\n心境：心境的境界决定了人物闭关时的效率\n丹毒：服用丹药会积攒丹毒，丹毒积攒到一定境界后会对人物的战斗造成影响\n灵感：灵感是论道时的重要状态，论道时会根据你的灵感状态消耗灵感，并对论道结果进行加成，灵感的积累速度为每个月增加1点，每次小境界突破增加50点，每次大境界突破增加100点。灵感的上限由心境决定，心境越高，灵感的上限越高。\n\n<Title>灵根属性</Title>\n<Image>shuxing3</Image>\n显示了金木水火土灵根的数值，灵根会影响获得灵气牌的概率。\n获得单一属性灵气牌的概率为此属性灵根的数值除以所有属性灵根数值之和。\n\n<Title>境界与修为</Title>\n<Image>shuxing4</Image>\n境界：境界分为炼气、筑基、金丹、元婴、化神。而每个大境界又分为了前中后期三个小境界。在境界到达金丹后，可以将鼠标移至丹田金丹处查看金丹属性。\n修为：修为会随着时间缓慢增长，当前境界的修为积攒满后，便可以突破一个小境界，但是大境界的突破就需要经历一个特殊关卡。==<Title>Basic Attributes</Title>\n<Image>shuxing1</Image>\nAge and Longevity: Longevity indicates the upper age limit a character can reach\nQuality: determines the speed of cultivation, the higher the Aptitude, the higher the bonus received by the basic cultivation speed\nComphrension: determines the efficiency of sensing thoughts, comprehending new divine abilities and breaking through feats when in seclusion When the efficiency of \n Soul Sense: in addition to will have an impact on the battle, but also in a variety of places need to determine the role of Soul Sense. \nTransportation speed: Determines the character's movement speed, the first move in battle and whether or not the character can successfully escape during battle \nCultivation speed: The value of the character's current monthly passive accumulated cultivation, this value is determined by the character's Aptitudes and major cultivation techniques \n\n<Title>Character state</Title>\n<Image>shuxing2</Image>\nMind state. The realm of mind determines the efficiency of the character when in seclusion \nDan Poison: taking Elixirs will accumulate Elixir Poison, which will affect the character's combat after accumulating to a certain realm \nInspiration: inspiration is an important state when discussing the path, the path will consume inspiration according to your inspiration state and add to the results of the path, the accumulation rate of inspiration is increased by 1 point per month, each small realm breakthrough increases by 50 points, and each The rate of inspiration accumulation is 1 point per month, 50 points per minor realm breakthrough, and 100 points per major realm breakthrough. The upper limit of inspiration is determined by the state of mind; the higher the state of mind, the higher the upper limit of inspiration. \n\n<Title>Spiritual Root Attributes</Title>\n<Image>shuxing3</Image>\n shows the value of metal, wood, water, fire and earth spiritual roots, which affect the probability of obtaining aura tiles. \nThe probability of obtaining a single attribute Aura tile is the value of this attribute's spirit root divided by the sum of all attribute spirit root values. \n\n<Title>Realm and Cultivation</Title>\n<Image>shuxing4</Image>\nRealm: The realm is divided into Qi Refining, Foundation Building, Golden Core, Nascent Soul, and Deityfication. And each major realm is divided into three smaller realms before, during and after. After the realm reaches Jindan, you can move the mouse to Dantian Jindan to check the Jindan properties. \nCultivation: cultivation will slowly grow with time, the current realm of cultivation accumulated full, you can break through a small realm, but the breakthrough of the big realm will need to experience a special level.
<Title>如何在宁州移动</Title>\n<Image>ningzhouditu1</Image>\n按键盘空格键可以快速定位到人物当前所在位置。\n左键点击人物附近一格的重要地点图标和主路点图标后，人物就会沿着路径移动，移动的时间与遁速挂钩，遁速越高，移动所消耗的时间越短。\n当装备飞行遁术后，可以无视路径，直接到达你点击的位置。\n\n<Title>主路点事件图标</Title>\n<Image>ningzhouditu2</Image>\n1. 妖兽图标：这个点上出现了游荡的妖兽，移动到这个位置后会触发与妖兽之间的战斗\n2. 奇遇图标：这个点上正在发生一些事情，移动到这个位置后会触发一件奇遇事件\n3. 重要事件图标：这个点上正在发生一些与剧情相关的事情，移动到这个位置后会触发这个事件\n\n<Title>支路</Title>\n<Image>ningzhouditu2</Image>\n宁州地图上除了主路之外还有一些支路。\n这些支路分布在主路点的周围，移动到一个主路点后便可以显示对应着这个主路点的支路状态，支路点会出现一些事件图标。\n1. 洞府秘境：移动到洞府秘境图标上便会进入一个洞府秘境的副本中。\n2. 野外药草：移动到野外药草图标上便会遇到一株野外药草，并触发采药事件。\n3. 任务事件：当你接取了委托任务后，支路点上就有概率出现一个任务图标，移动到任务图标上可以触发委托任务事件。==<Title>How to move in Ningzhou</Title>\n<Image>ningzhouditu1</Image>\nPress the keyboard spacebar to quickly locate the character's current location. \nAfter left-clicking on the icon of an important place and the icon of the main road point near the character, the character will move along the path, the time of moving is linked to the recluse speed, the higher the recluse speed, the shorter the time consumed to move. \nWhen equipped with flying recluse, you can ignore the path and reach the location you clicked directly. \n\n<Title>Event icons at main path points</Title>\n<Image>ningzhouditu2</Image>\n1. Demon beast icon: there is a wandering demon beast at this point, moving to this location will trigger a battle with the demon beast\n2. Strange encounter icon: something is happening at this point, moving to The important event icon: something related to the plot is happening at this point, moving to this location will trigger this event \n\n<Title>Branch Roads</Title>\n<Image>ningzhouditu2</Image>\nOther than the main road on the map of Ningzhou there are also some branch roads. \nThese branch roads are distributed around the main road points, and moving to a main road point will show the status of the branch roads corresponding to that main road point, and some event icons will appear at the branch road points. \n1. Cave Secret Realm: Move to the Cave Secret Realm icon to enter a copy of the Cave Secret Realm. \n2. Wild Herbs: Move to the Wild Herbs icon and you will encounter a wild herb and trigger a medicine picking event. \n3. Mission event: When you have taken a commissioned mission, there is a probability that a mission icon will appear on the bypass point, and moving to the mission icon will trigger the commissioned mission event.
<Title>威胁</Title>\r\n<Image>weixie1</Image>\r\n你可以通过威胁，逼迫游戏中的人物交出身上的物品，而不用截杀对方。\r\n无论威胁成功与否，都会降低你与那名NPC的好感度，还会降低你在这片地域的声望，当然，降低的声望会远低于截杀。\r\n威胁他人时除了使用境界压制和神识震慑这种普遍方式外，还可以搬出自己的好友，如果你好友的实力大于对方的话，就有可能威胁成功。当然如果你通过这种方式威胁成功的话，可能还会额外降低这位好友的好感度。==<Title>Threats</Title>\r\n<Image>weixie1</Image>\r\nYou can force in-game characters to hand over items on them by threatening them, without having to intercept them. \r\nWhether the threat is successful or not, it will reduce your goodwill with that NPC and also reduce your reputation in this territory, of course, the reduced reputation will be much lower than the interception. \r\n threaten others in addition to the use of realm suppression and Soul Sense deterrence this common way, but also to move their friends, if your friend's strength is greater than the other party, it is possible to threaten success. Of course, if you succeed in this way, you may additionally reduce the friend's favorability.
<Title>对话</Title>\n<Image>duihua</Image>\n在对话窗口弹出后，无法进行除对话操作之外的其它操作。\n在对话中按住键盘esc键可快速跳过对话。==<Title>Dialogue</Title>\n<Image>duihua</Image>\nAfter the dialogue window pops up, you can't perform any other operations other than dialogue operations. \nPress and hold the keyboard esc key during the dialogue to quickly skip the dialogue.
<Title>开始战斗</Title>\n<Image>zhandou1</Image>\n在战斗中，你需要通过使用神通和武器击败对手。\n通过鼠标点击或快捷键tab可以直接使用武器。\n通过鼠标点击神通或按下指定快捷键可以进入神通的准备释放状态。\n\n<Title>释放神通</Title>\n<Image>zhandou2</Image>\n1. 神通的说明以及释放神通所需要的灵气种类和数量\n其中图标“同”代表了任意五行属性灵气，而“同”之间的分割线代表你需要用对应不同属性的灵气牌来释放。\n2. 点击神通后会有被随机选取上来的相应的灵气牌\n你可以通过再次点击神通重新随机灵气牌或者通过鼠标点击改变这张灵气牌的使用状态。\n当选择的灵气牌满足神通需求时，就可以点击确定释放神通。\n点击取消就会取消释放神通的过程，回到默认的战斗状态。\n\n<Title>回合结束</Title>\n<Image>zhandou3</Image>\n在默认战斗状态下，点击回合结束可以结束当前回合。\n如果回合结束时的灵气牌大于你能容纳的灵气上限，就需要弃置相应数量的灵气牌才可以结束回合。==<Title>Starting a battle</Title>\n<Image>zhandou1</Image>\nIn a battle, you need to defeat your opponent by using divine abilities and weapons. \nBy mouse click or shortcut tab you can use weapons directly. \nYou can enter the ready release state of an Avatar by clicking on it with the mouse or pressing the specified shortcut key. \n<Title>Release Avatar</Title>\n<Image>zhandou2</Image>\n1. Description of the Avatar and the type and amount of Aura required to release it\nThe icon 'same' represents any five element attribute Aura, and the The split line between 'same' means you need to use the aura tiles corresponding to different attributes to release. \n2. After clicking on the aura, the corresponding aura tile will be randomly selected \nYou can re-randomize the aura tile by clicking on the aura again or change the use status of this aura tile by mouse click. \nWhen the selected Aura tile meets the requirement of the Avatar, you can click OK to release the Avatar. \nClicking Cancel will cancel the process of releasing the Avatar and return to the default combat state. \n\n<Title>End of Round</Title>\n<Image>zhandou3</Image>\nIn the default battle state, click End of Round to end the current round. \nIf the aura tiles at the end of the turn are larger than the maximum amount of aura you can hold, you need to discard the corresponding number of aura tiles to end the turn.
<Title>感悟</Title>\n<Image>biguan4</Image>\n论道获得的思绪需要在这里感悟，才能增加相应的悟道经验。\r\n思绪之间也有品阶的区别，思绪的品阶越高，感悟的效率也就越高。\r\n同时，感悟思绪的效率也受到悟性的加成。==<Title>Sensation</Title>\n<Image>biguan4</Image>\nThoughts obtained from the Discourse need to be sensed here to increase the corresponding Comphrension experience. \r\nThere is also a difference in rank between the thoughts, the higher the rank of the thoughts, the more efficient the enlightenment will be. \r\nAt the same time, the efficiency of perceiving the thoughts is also subject to the bonus of enlightenment.
<Title>战前准备</Title>\n<Image>zhanqianzhunbei</Image>\n在开始战斗前，我们会先进入一个战前准备的页面。\n1. 开始战斗：直接进入战斗\n2. 神识探查：通过神识探查对方的熟悉状态和使用中的神通功法\n3. 战前准备：点击战前准备会进入游戏菜单，可以在战前服用丹药以及调整神通功法和法宝的配置\n4. 逃之夭夭：如果你遁速高于对方的话，可以在战斗开始前就逃走而避免战斗==<Title>Pre-battle preparation</Title>\n<Image>zhanqianzhunbei</Image> \nBefore starting the battle, we will enter a page of battle preparation. \n1. Start the battle: go directly to the battle \n2. Soul Sense Scouting: use Soul Sense to scout the familiar status of the opponent and the Avatar techniques in use \n3. Pre-battle Preparation: click Pre-battle Preparation to enter the game menu, you can take potions and adjust the configuration of Avatar techniques and magic treasures before the battle \n4. Escape: if you are faster than the opponent, you can escape before the battle starts and avoid the battle. to escape and avoid the battle
<Title>战斗状态</Title>\n<Image>zhandouzhuangtai</Image>\n战斗时，可以在左上角和右上角观察敌我双方的状态\n1. 境界：图标显示当前人物的大境界，鼠标移动到境界图标时可以显示此人的大道天赋\n2. 战斗状态：这一列图标显示人物的当前状态，其中会显示防具饰品、功法、服用过的丹药以及buff等，鼠标移动到相应图标上可以显示相应状态。\n3. 当前灵气牌/灵气上限：这里显示了人物当前的灵气牌数量和可以容纳的灵气上限。==<Title>Battle Status</Title>\n<Image>zhandouzhuangtai</Image>\nWhile fighting, you can observe the status of both the enemy and us in the upper left and upper right corners\n1. Realm: The icon shows the current character's major realm, and when the mouse moves to the realm icon, it shows the person's great talent\n2. Status: This column of icons shows the current status of the character, which will show defense accessories, feats, taken potions and buffs, etc. Mouse movement to the corresponding icon will show the corresponding status. \n3. Current aura tiles / aura limit: This shows the number of aura tiles the character currently has and the aura limit it can hold.
<Title>截杀</Title>\n你可以选择在任何非大庭广众的情况下截杀游戏中的其它非剧情人物。\r\n截杀开启后就会开启一场战斗。\r\n战斗成功会会概率获得此人的背包物品，并降低大量当地的声望。\r\n战斗失败逃跑成功会大幅降低你与此人的好感度。==<Title>Interceptions</Title> \nYou can choose to intercept other non-plot characters in the game in any non-public situation. \r\nInterception opens a battle when it is on. \r\nA successful battle will result in a probability of obtaining the person's backpack items and a large reduction in local reputation. \r\nFailure to escape from a battle will significantly reduce your goodwill with that person.
<Title>探查/查看</Title>\n探查/查看是查看游戏人物状态，大道感悟和重要经历的工具。\r\n如果你与该游戏人物好感度状态达到了熟悉或以上，就可以直接查看。\r\n不然就需要进行一次神识判定，需要你的神识高于对方时才可以探查成功，探查失败被对方发现会降低你与他之间的好感度。\n<Image>tancha1</Image>\n在探查时，你可以查看对方的装备；功法技能；属性和状态。\r\n还可以查看对方的悟道境界和大道天赋。\r\n\n<Title>人生经历</Title>\n<Image>tancha2</Image>\n游戏中的人物都有自己的人生。\n在探查时，你可以看到这个游戏人物一生中发生的所有重要事件。==<Title>Explore/View</Title> \nExplore/View is a tool to check the game character's status, great path insights and important experiences. \r\nIf your good sense status with that game character has reached familiar or above, you can view it directly. \r\nOtherwise, you need to make a Soul Sense determination, need your Soul Sense is higher than the other party when you can explore successfully, failure to explore by the other party will reduce the good feeling between you and him. \n<Image>tancha1</Image>\nWhen probing, you can check the other party's equipment; technique skills; attributes and status. \r\nYou can also view the other party's enlightenment realm and dao talent. \r\n\n<Title>Life Experience</Title>\n<Image>tancha2</Image>\nThe characters in the game have their own lives. \nWhen exploring, you can see all the important events that happened in the life of this game character.
<Title>灵感</Title>\n灵感：灵感是论道时的重要状态，论道时会根据你的灵感状态消耗灵感，并对论道结果进行加成，灵感的积累速度为每个月增加1点，每次小境界突破增加50点，每次大境界突破增加100点。灵感的上限由心境决定，心境越高，灵感的上限越高。\n\n灵感小于20\n灵思枯竭：双方悟道值的获取减少100%，悟道经验减少50%，每次论道灵感清零。\n灵感大于20\n心无波澜：双方悟道经验和悟道值正常获取，每次论道消耗20点灵感。\n灵感大于40\n灵光闪现：双方悟道经验的获取增加100%，每次论道消耗40点灵感。\n灵感大于80\n天人感应：双方悟道经验和悟道值的获取增加300%，每次论道消耗80点灵感。\n\n<Title>论道的选题</Title>\n<Image>lundao2</Image>\n论道开始时可以选择论题。\n通常来说，选择论题的双方悟道境界越高，选择的论题越多，论道的难度越高。\n但同时，悟道境界越高，论题越多，论道获得的收益也就越多。\n\n<Title>论道</Title>\n<Image>lundao3</Image>\n可以看到，论道时会依据你选择的论题提供目标，同时你也会获得与论题相对应的论点牌。\r\n论点牌有等级之分，与你对应的悟道境界相关，悟道境界越高，就能获得等级越高的论点。\r\n论道时，双方提出的相同属性、相同等级的论点会碰撞形成一个更高一级的论点，不断地碰撞论点，满足上方的论题目标，就能完成相应的论题，获得对应等级的思绪。\r\n<Image>lundao4</Image>\n\n<Title>论道收获</Title>\r\n<Image>lundao5</Image>\n只要完成任意一个论题，论道就可以认为是成功的，论道成功后，会根据你完成的论题，提供给你相应的思绪，此时，论题要求的论点等级越高，思绪的品阶和获得的悟道经验也会越高。\r\n而同时，你们双方在论道时论点的碰撞会不断地积累悟道值，碰撞的论点等级越高，获得的悟道值也就越高，当悟道值积累到一定程度后，就可以获得悟道点。==<Title>Inspiration</Title>\nInspiration: Inspiration is an important state when discussing the Dao. The Dao will consume inspiration according to your inspiration state and add to the result of the Dao. The accumulation rate of inspiration is increased by 1 point per month, 50 points per minor realm breakthrough, and 100 points per major realm breakthrough. The upper limit of inspiration is determined by the state of mind; the higher the state of mind, the higher the upper limit of inspiration. \nInspiration less than 20\n Spiritual thought depletion: the acquisition of both sides' enlightenment value is reduced by 100%, the enlightenment experience is reduced by 50%, and the inspiration is cleared to zero for each argument. \nInspiration greater than 20\nMind without waves: Both sides get normal enlightenment experience and enlightenment value, and consume 20 points of inspiration each time of the dao. \n Inspiration greater than 40\n Aura: Both sides gain 100% more enlightenment experience, and consume 40 points of inspiration each time the sermon. \nInspiration greater than 80\nCelestial inspiration: the acquisition of both sides' enlightenment experience and enlightenment value is increased by 300%, and 80 points of inspiration are consumed for each discussion. \n\n<Title>Selecting topics for the Discourse</Title>\n<Image>lundao2</Image>\nYou can choose the topic of the Discourse at the beginning of the Discourse. \nUsually, the higher the realm of enlightenment of the two parties choosing the thesis topic, the more thesis topics are chosen, and the more difficult the thesis is. \nBut at the same time, the higher the realm of enlightenment, the more thesis topics, the more gains the argument gains. \n\n<Title>Thesis on the Way</Title>\n<Image>lundao3</Image>\nYou can see that the thesis on the Way will provide targets based on the thesis you choose, and you will also get the thesis tiles corresponding to the thesis. \r\nThe argument tiles are graded according to your corresponding realm of enlightenment; the higher the realm of enlightenment, the higher the grade of argument you will receive. When \r\n arguments are made, arguments with the same attributes and the same rank presented by both sides will collide to form a higher ranked argument. Keep colliding arguments and meeting the goal of the argument above, you will be able to complete the corresponding argument and get the corresponding ranked thought. \r\n<Image>lundao4</Image>\n\n<Title>Thesis Harvest</Title>\r\n<Image>lundao5</Image>\n As long as you complete any one of the theses, the thesis can be considered successful, and after the success of the thesis, you will be provided with the corresponding \r\nThe higher the level of argument required by the argument, the higher the rank of the thought and the enlightenment experience gained will be at this point. \r\nAnd at the same time, the collision of your arguments during the argument will keep accumulating the enlightenment value. The higher the grade of the colliding arguments, the higher the enlightenment value obtained, and when the enlightenment value accumulates to a certain level, you can obtain the enlightenment point.
<Title>物品列表</Title>\n<Image>wupin1</Image>\n物品列表中的物品可以通过右键点击快速使用/装备。\n游戏中获得的各种物品可以分类为：\n法宝，丹药，秘籍，药草，材料，其它\n\n<Title>装备栏</Title>\n<Image>wupin2</Image>\n而在装备栏中的四个槽位分别为：\n武器，防具，饰品，灵舟。\n可以通过右键或者拖动到相应装备栏装备。==<Title>Item list</Title>\n<Image>wupin1</Image>\nItems in the item list can be used/equipped quickly by right-clicking. \nThe various items obtained in the game can be categorized as: \nMagical treasures, elixirs, secrets, herbs, materials, other \n\n<Title>Equipment bar</Title>\n<Image>wupin2</Image>\nAnd the four slots in the equipment bar are: \nWeapons, defensive gear, accessories, and spirit boats. \nCan be equipped by right-clicking or dragging to the corresponding equipment bar.
<Title>神通</Title>\n<Image>shentong1</Image>\n在游戏中可以通过各种方式获得神通，通过闭关领悟获得神通后，就会在神通列表中显示。\n获得的神通需要通过拖动装备到神通栏中才可以在战斗中使用。==<Title>Aptitudes</Title>\n<Image>shentong1</Image>\nAptitudes can be acquired in various ways in the game, and will be shown in the aptitude list after being acquired through retreat comprehension. \nThe acquired Avatar needs to be equipped by dragging it to the Avatar bar before it can be used in battle.
<Title>突破</Title>\n<Image>biguan3</Image>\n游戏中的功法有着不同的层数，初步领悟的功法只能发挥它第一层的效果，此时就需要继续参悟突破功法了。\n但是不同境界能够发挥出功法的效果是有上限的，比如炼气期只能把人阶功法发挥到第三层，只能把地阶功法发挥到第二层，只能把天阶功法发挥到第一层的效果。\n而接下去，每提升一个大境界，都可以在这个上限的基础上增加一层。\n而突破的速度会受到对应的悟道境界和悟性的加成，而突破功法时也会获得相应属性的悟道经验加成==<Title>Breakthrough</Title>\n<Image>biguan3</Image>\nThe game has different layers of feats, the initial comprehension of the feats can only play its first layer of effect, then you need to continue to enlighten the breakthrough feats. \nBut different realms can play the effect of the gong method is a ceiling, such as the refining period can only play the human class gong method to the third layer, can only play the earth class gong method to the second layer, can only play the sky class gong method to the first layer of effect. \nAnd following that, every time you raise a big realm, you can add a layer to this upper limit. \nAnd the speed of breakthrough will be added by the corresponding enlightenment realm and enlightenment, and the breakthrough gong method will also gain the corresponding attribute of enlightenment experience bonus
<Title>筑基</Title>\n突破筑基时，你将进入入定的状态。在九回合内不断压缩体内灵气，直到灵气压缩值达到100，即可成功突破。\n所有辅助突破的丹药需在筑基开始前突破，过早服用将失效。\n<Image>zhuji_1</Image>\n<Title>压缩灵气</Title>\n使用单次消耗灵气牌更多的方式压缩灵气时，效率最高。\n<Image>zhuji_2</Image>\n<Title>伐经洗髓</Title>\n突破成功后，多余的灵气将被经脉吸收，并额外提升你的最大生命值。每超过1点，将额外提升两点最大生命值。\n<Image>zhuji_3</Image>\n<Title>突破失败</Title>\n若突破失败，不会有性命之忧，但修为将倒退1000点。==<Title>Building Foundation</Title> \nWhen you break through the building foundation, you will enter the state of entering. Keep compressing the aura in your body for nine rounds until the aura compression value reaches 100, then you will successfully break through. \nAll elixirs that aid in breakthrough need to be taken before the start of foundation building to breakthrough, taking them too early will invalidate them. \n<Image>zhuji_1</Image>\n<Title>Compressed Aura</Title>\nThe most efficient way to compress Aura when using a single consumption of more Aura tiles. \n<Image>zhuji_2</Image>\n<Title>Breaking through the meridian and cleansing the marrow</Title>\nAfter a successful breakthrough, the excess aura will be absorbed by the meridian and boost your maximum Health additionally. For every point over 1, two additional points of maximum Health will be boosted. \n<Image>zhuji_3</Image>\n<Title>Breakthrough failure</Title>\nIf the breakthrough fails, there will be no fear for your life, but your cultivation will be regressed by 1000 points.
<Title>结丹</Title>\n突破筑基时，你将进入入定的状态。在九回合内完成【三花聚顶】，【五气朝元】，并在【凝液成丹】阶段至少凝聚一次五行源灵气，即可成功突破。\n所有辅助突破的丹药需在结丹开始前突破，过早服用将失效。\n<Image>jiedan_1</Image>\n<Title>丹分九品</Title>\n在【凝液成丹】阶段，凝聚的五行源灵气越多，金丹品阶越高，五行灵气的属性比例也将影响最终成丹的属性。\n金丹的品阶越高，提升的修炼速度与属性也越高。若结成八品或九品金丹，还将额外提升战斗时的初始灵气牌数量。\n<Image>jiedan_2</Image>==<Title>Termination</Title>\nWhen you break through the foundation building, you will enter the state of entering. You can successfully break through by completing 【Three Flowers Ascension】, 【Five Qi Consolidation】 within nine rounds and condensing five elements of source aura at least once during the 【Core Condensation】 stage. \nAll elixirs that assist in breakthrough need to be broken through before the start of dan formation and will be invalid if taken too early. \n<Image>jiedan_1</Image>\n<Title>Dan is divided into nine grades</Title>\nThe more five elements of source aura are condensed at the 【condensing liquid into a dan】 stage, the higher the grade of the golden dan, and the ratio of the attributes of the five elements of aura will also affect the attributes of the final formed dan. The higher the grade of the \n golden pellet, the higher the enhanced cultivation speed and attributes. If the eighth or ninth grade golden elixir is formed, it will also additionally enhance the number of initial aura tiles during battle. \n<Image>jiedan_2</Image>
<Title>结婴</Title>\n<Image>jieying_1</Image>\n结婴需经过【碎丹】与【化婴】两个阶段。在【意志】或【经脉】属性降低到0以前，完成【化婴】，即可成功突破。\n在结婴前学习的秘术可以在此时进行使用，它们能大幅提高你结婴成功的几率。\n在【化婴】阶段，你将受到“心魔”的考验。是选择在意志溃散前强行结婴，还是坚持到心魔消散，全看你自己的选择。\n<Image>jieying_2</Image>\n<Title>意志</Title>\n【意志】受【心境】与【神道】感悟影响，【心境】与【神道】感悟越高，【意志】上限越高\n当【意志】低于50时，玩家受到的心魔伤害将提升20%\n当【意志】归0时，结婴失败，结婴者将身死道消\n<Image>jieying_3</Image>\n<Title>经脉</Title>\n【经脉】受【体道】与【气道】感悟影响，【体道】与【气道】感悟越高，【经脉】上限越高\n当【经脉】血量低于50时，每回合抽牌数-2\n当【经脉】归0时，结婴失败，结婴者将修为大退，但下次结婴时，【经脉】上限+5\n<Image>jieying_4</Image>\n<Title>突破成功</Title>\n突破成功后，金丹提供的血量上限与修炼速度加成翻倍。\n元婴能够额外修炼一本功法，并根据功法的品阶与属性不同，额外获得新的特性。==<Title>Nascent Soul</Title>\n<Image>jieying_1</Image>\nNascent Soul requires two stages: 【Dan Shattering】 and 【Nascent Formation】. Before the 【Will】 or 【Meridian】 attribute is reduced to 0, complete 【Nascent Transformation】 to successfully break through. \nThe secret techniques learned before Nascent Soul can be used at this time, and they can significantly increase your chances of successful Nascent formation. \nIn the 【Nascent transformation】 stage, you will be tested by the 'heart demon'. It's up to you whether you choose to forcibly form a Nascent Soul before your will collapses, or to hold on until the demon dissipates. \n<Image>jieying_2</Image>\n<Title>Will</Title>\n【Will】 is affected by 【Mental State】 and 【Divine Path】 perceptions, the higher the 【Mind】 and 【Divine Path】 perceptions, the higher the 【Mental State】 limit\nWhen 【Will】 is below 50, the player will receive 20% more heart demon damage\nWhen 【Will】 goes to 0 When 【Will】 goes to 0, the Nascent Soul-making fails and the Nascent Soul-maker will die \n<Image>jieying_3</Image>\n<Title>Meridians</Title>\n【Meridians】 are affected by 【Body Dao】 and 【Qi Dao】 perceptions, the higher the 【Body Dao】 and 【Qi Dao】 perceptions, the higher the 【Meridian】 limit\nWhen 【Meridian】 Life level is below 50, the number of cards drawn per turn is -2 \nWhen 【Meridian】 goes to 0, the Nascent formation fails and the Nascent former will have a big regression in cultivation, but the next time the Nascent is formed, the 【Meridian】 cap is +5\n<Image>jieying_4</Image>\n<Title>Breakthrough Success</Title>\nAfter a successful breakthrough, the Life cap and cultivation speed bonus provided by the jindan are doubled. \nThe firstborn is able to cultivate an additional gong method and gain additional new characteristics depending on the gong method's rank and attributes.
<Title>论道</Title>\n<Image>lundao1</Image>\n当你与一个人相识后，就可以解锁论道功能。\n如果你与对方境界相仿，那就可以直接开始论道，但是对于境界比你高的人来说，除非你与他之间的关系达到熟悉，不然对面可能不会浪费自己的灵感与你论道。\n具体论道系统玩法可以查看系统说明下的论道内容。==<Title>Talking about Tao</Title>\n<Image>lundao1</Image>\nWhen you get acquainted with a person, you can unlock the Talking about Tao feature. \nIf you are in a similar realm as the other person, then you can start the Discourse directly, but for someone who is in a higher realm than you, unless the relationship between you and him reaches familiarity, the opposite side may not waste their inspiration to Discourse with you. \nThe specific way to play the Discourse system can be seen in the Discourse content under the system description.
<Title>请教</Title>\r\n<Image>qingjiao1</Image>\r\n请教是游戏中获得神通功法的比较重要的方式，随着你与对方的好感度提升，能够请教的神通功法等级也会随之提高。请教会消耗一部分情分，当情分不足时，即使好感度足够也无法请教成功。\r\n请教后可以获得相应神通功法的秘籍，但是这本秘籍没有任何价值，无法交易。\r\n\n<Title>不传之秘</Title>\r\n<Image>qingjiao2</Image>\n在请教界面，有些功法神通会被标记上“秘“字字样，需要通过与对应功法所属地域的声望达到德高望重才可以解锁请教。==<Title>Please teach</Title> \r\n<Image>qingjiao1</Image> \r\nPlease teach is one of the more important ways to get the Avatar techniques in the game, as your good feeling with the other person increases, the level of the Avatar techniques you can ask will also increase. If you don't have enough love points, you won't be able to ask for advice even if you have enough love points.  \r\n\n<Title>The Secret of the Untold</Title>\r\n<Image>qingjiao2</Image>\nIn the request for advice screen, some of the techniques and abilities will be marked with the word 'secret', and need to reach the reputation of the region to which the corresponding technique belongs by You can only unlock the 'Secret' if you have a high reputation in the region where the technique belongs to.
<Title>赠礼</Title>\n<Image>zengli1</Image>\n赠礼时会根据你赠送物品的价值和收礼人的兴趣增加情分。\n赠礼积累的情分可以增加好感度，这也是游戏中增加与其他人物好感度的主要方式之一。\n而增加好感度需要的情分需求随着对方的境界的提高而提高.==<Title>Gifting</Title>\n<Image>zengli1</Image>\nGifting will add love points based on the value of the item you are giving and the interest of the recipient. \nThe love points accumulated from gift-giving can increase good feelings, which is one of the main ways to increase good feelings with other characters in the game. \nAnd the need for love points to increase goodwill increases as the other person's realm increases.
<Title>采集</Title>\n<Image>caiji1</Image>\n当你在一些场景中发现这个按钮，或者是在副本中触发一些采集相关对话时，就可以开启采集界面。\r\n采集是游戏中获取药草和炼器材料的主要方式之一。\r\n<Image>caiji2</Image>\n你可以选择准备花在采集上的时间和选择重点寻找的材料。\r\n采集消耗的时间越多，获得的材料也会越多，而点击选择重点寻找的材料可以大幅提升这次采集中获得这种材料的概率。\r\n随着你境界的提升，采集的效率也会随之提高。==<Title>Gathering</Title>\n<Image>caiji1</Image>\nWhen you find this button in some scenes, or trigger some gathering-related dialogue in a copy, you can open the gathering screen. \r\nGathering is one of the main ways to get herbs and smithing materials in the game. \r\n<Image>caiji2</Image>\nYou can choose how much time you are prepared to spend on gathering and choose which materials to focus on finding. \r\nThe more time you consume in gathering, the more materials you will get, and clicking to select the materials to focus on finding can dramatically increase the probability of getting such materials in this gathering. \r\nAs your realm increases, the efficiency of gathering will also increase.
<Title>领悟</Title>\r\n<Image>biguan2</Image>\r\n在游戏过程中会获得各种秘籍，此时就需要通过闭关来领悟这些秘籍获得相应的神通功法和悟道经验。\r\n有些秘籍会有领悟条件，只有悟道境界达到后才能继续领悟。\r\n领悟的速度受到对应的悟道境界和悟性的加成。==<Title>Comprehension</Title>\r\n<Image>biguan2</Image>\r\nDuring the game, you will get various secrets, and then you need to comprehend these secrets through retreat to get the corresponding divine power techniques and enlightenment experience. \r\nSome secret manuals will have comprehension conditions, only after the enlightenment realm is reached to continue to comprehend. \r\nThe speed of comprehension is added by the corresponding enlightenment realm and enlightenment.

Buff层数不足无法使用==Not enough Buff levels to use
NPC可以与之切磋，不过要到好感度30之后才可以。==NPCs can be sparred with, but only after reaching a goodwill level of 30.
<color=#24a5d6>寿元</color>顾名思义就是你的寿命长度，一般来说不同境界的修士寿元大不相同，但也有各种天材易宝能提升人的寿元。==<color=#24a5d6>Longevity</color> is, as the name implies, the length of your lifespan. Generally speaking, the lifespan of cultivators of different realms varies greatly, but there are also various heavenly materials and treasures that can enhance one's lifespan.
<color=#24a5d6>心境</color>决定了你闭关修炼的速度，若是心境等级低于你现在的境界，则事倍功半，反之亦然。==<color=#24a5d6>Mental State</color> determines the speed of your retreat cultivation; if the level of your mind is lower than your current realm, you will get half the result with twice the effort, and vice versa.
<color=#24a5d6>悟性</color>是对事物的感知力，思考和洞察力。悟性数值越高，领悟法术与功法的所耗费的时间越短。==<color=#24a5d6> Comphrension</color> is the ability to perceive, think and see things. The higher the value of perception, the shorter the time it takes to comprehend spells and feats.
<color=#24a5d6>气血</color>决定了你的生命值，在战斗中若是气血耗尽便会生死道消。==<color=#24a5d6> Blood</color> determines your lifeforce, and if you run out of Life in battle you will live or die.
<color=#24a5d6>灵根</color>决定了你在对战时能够抽到各系灵气牌的概率权重，一般来说，灵根属性越精纯越有利。==<color=#24a5d6> Spiritual Root </color> determines the weight of probability that you will be able to draw each line of Aura tiles when playing against each other; generally speaking, the purer the Aura attribute, the more favourable it is.
<color=#24a5d6>灵石</color>修士之间进行交易的基础货币，一般来说，越好的东西要越多的灵石。==<color=#24a5d6> Spirit Stones</color> The base currency for transactions between cultivators, generally the better the item the more spirit stones are required.
<color=#24a5d6>神识</color>是每个修士强大灵魂所产生的力量，一般来说，神识类技能会对神识低于自己的敌人有额外的效果。==<color=#24a5d6> Soul Sense</color> is the power generated by every cultivator's powerful soul, and generally speaking, Soul Sense-type skills will have an additional effect on enemies whose Soul Sense is lower than one's own.
<color=#24a5d6>资质</color>决定了你的修炼速度和灵根品质，资质越高，修为增长越快，灵根也越精纯。==<color=#24a5d6>Aptitude</color> determines your cultivation speed and the quality of your spiritual roots. The higher your Aptitude, the faster your cultivation will grow and the more pure your spiritual roots will be.
<color=#24a5d6>遁速</color>决定了你在地图上移动所消耗的时间。战斗中遁速更快的一方可以抢先出手，而只有遁速比对手高时，才可以在战斗中逃遁。==<color=#24a5d6> Speed</color> determines how long it takes you to move around the map. The side with the faster recluse speed can strike first in battle, and you can only escape in battle if you have a higher recluse speed than your opponent.

{FirstName}{daoyou}也算是在宁州略有名气，但比我还差许多。=={FirstName}{daoyou} is also slightly famous in Ningzhou, but much less so than me.
{FirstName}{daoyou}于猎魔试炼勇斗地魔的一战着实精彩，那翩若惊鸿的身法，势如怒涛的进攻，{daoyou}战斗的英姿令人难以忘却。==The battle in which {FirstName}{daoyou} fought the Earth Demon in the Demon Hunting Trial was truly spectacular, with the graceful body movement and the fierce attack, {daoyou}'s fighting style was unforgettable.

【剑意】将【惊涛】转化为【剑气】，【惊涛】置为1，【止水】置为4。==【Sword Intent】 transforms 【Violent Storm】 into 【Sword Qi】, 【Violent Storm】 is set to 1, 【Calm Water】 is set to 4.
【剑意】将【惊涛】转化为【剑气】，【惊涛】置为1，【止水】置为6。==【Sword Intent】 transforms 【Violent Storm】 into 【Sword Qi】, 【Violent Storm】 is set to 1, 【Calm Water】 is set to 6.
【剑意】将【惊涛】转化为【剑气】，【惊涛】置为1，【止水】置为8。==【Sword Intent】 transforms 【Violent Storm】 into 【Sword Qi】, 【Violent Storm】 is set to 1, 【Calm Water】 is set to 8.
【剑意】当有【天剑】【地剑】【人剑】时才可以使用，造成10点剑系伤害，每有【人剑】*1增加伤害1点；每有【地剑】*1增加伤害2点；每有【天剑】*1增加伤害3点；【生】增加伤害10。==【Sword Intent】 can only be used when there is a 【Heavenly Sword】 【Earthly Sword】 【Human Sword】, dealing 10 points of sword damage, increasing damage by 1 point for every 【Human Sword】*1; increasing damage by 2 points for every 【Earthly Sword】*1; increasing damage by 3 points for every 【Heavenly Sword】*1; 【Raw】 increasing damage by 10.
【剑意】当有【天剑】【地剑】【人剑】时才可以使用，造成1点剑系伤害，每有【人剑】*1增加伤害1点；每有【地剑】*1增加伤害2点；每有【天剑】*1增加伤害3点；【生】增加伤害3。==【Sword Intent】 can only be used when there is a 【Heavenly Sword】 【Earthly Sword】 【Human Sword】, dealing 1 point of sword damage, increasing damage by 1 point for every 【Human Sword】*1; increasing damage by 2 points for every 【Earthly Sword】*1; increasing damage by 3 points for every 【Heavenly Sword】*1; 【Raw】 increasing damage by 3.
【剑意】当有【天剑】【地剑】【人剑】时才可以使用，造成20点剑系伤害，每有【人剑】*1增加伤害1点；每有【地剑】*1增加伤害2点；每有【天剑】*1增加伤害3点；【生】增加伤害15。==【Sword Intent】 can only be used when there is a 【Heavenly Sword】 【Earthly Sword】 【Human Sword】, dealing 20 points of sword damage, increasing damage by 1 point for every 【Human Sword】*1; increasing damage by 2 points for every 【Earthly Sword】*1; increasing damage by 3 points for every 【Heavenly Sword】*1; 【Raw】 increasing damage by 15.
【剑意】当有【天剑】【地剑】【人剑】时才可以使用，造成2点剑系伤害，每有【人剑】*1增加伤害1点；每有【地剑】*1增加伤害2点；每有【天剑】*1增加伤害3点；【生】增加伤害5。==【Sword Intent】 can only be used when there is a 【Heavenly Sword】 【Earthly Sword】 【Human Sword】, dealing 2 points of sword damage, increasing damage by 1 point for every 【Human Sword】*1; increasing damage by 2 points for every 【Earthly Sword】*1; increasing damage by 3 points for every 【Heavenly Sword】*1; 【Raw】 increasing damage by 5.

一斩==A chop
一本记录了基础淬体法门的道书，对于体修感悟很有帮助。==A dao book that records the basic body-hardening Skills and is useful for body cultivator.

一本记录了神识出体感悟自然的道书，对于炼神或许能够有所帮助。==A Daoist book that records the senses of the divine out of the body, which may be useful for refining the spirit.
一本记录了禾山道炼魂邪术的书籍，阅读后也可提升对神魂之道的领悟。==A book recording the evil art of soul refinement of the Harvest Mountain Sect. Reading it also enhances one's perception of the Dao of the Divine Soul.
一枚神秘的玉佩碎片。==A mysterious fragment of a jade pendant.
一柄被魔气沾染的灵剑突然袭击了你，魏无极对这柄飞剑产生了熟悉的感觉，或许可以从这柄飞剑里找到一些能够唤起他记忆的线索。==A spirit sword tainted with demonic qi suddenly attacks you. Wei Wuji has a familiar feeling about this flying sword, perhaps he can find some clues that can jog his memory from this flying sword.
一株菩提花落入你的掌中，仙途中本就伴随各种机缘巧合。你会心一笑，突然福至心灵触摸到一丝大道法门。\\n你将它记在心里，打算闲时再仔细体悟。\\n思绪+1==A Bodhi Blossom falls into your palm, the journey to immortality is accompanied by various coincidences. You will smile, suddenly blessed to touch a touch of the great dao dharma. \\nYou keep it in your heart, intending to carefully comprehend it when you are free. \\nThoughts+1
一次偶然的机会，你见到御剑飞行的修士破空飞过。你被神通广大的修真者所吸引，才七岁的你便暗自下定决心要踏上修真之路。==By chance, you saw a monk flying through the sky with a sword. You were fascinated by the power of the practitioners and, at the age of seven, you made up your mind to embark on the path of cultivation.
一次意外让你坠下悬崖，但你反而因祸得福，采得不少珍贵的草药。==An accident caused you to fall off a cliff, but you were blessed with a number of precious herbs.
一比一比一==One to one to one
一比七比一==One to seven to one
一气分神功1==One Breath Divination 1
一气分神功2==One Breath Divine Skill 2
一气分神功3==One Qi Divination 3
一气分神功4==Ichiban Shen Gong 4
一气分神功5==One Qi Divination 5
一气分神功==One Breath Dividing Spirit Skill
一淼==Yimiao
一种一旦困住敌方便能够吸收其精血的诡异法术，曾一度被认为是魔道法门。==A strange spell that can absorb the Life of an enemy once trapped, once thought to be a magic spell.
一种与辰砂伴生的灵药，看似普通的灵芝，但去除表面的膜之后，便会露出水银般的本体，剧毒，以之炼药可以锻炼体内灵气。==This is an ordinary looking herb, but when the membrane is removed, it reveals its mercury-like body, which is highly poisonous.
一种以水系灵气治疗自身的恢复类法术，相比同类型的法门效果尤为显著。==A restorative spell that uses water aura to heal oneself, particularly effective compared to other spells of the same type.
一种以消耗生命力为代价的奇诡刀法，每用一次都会造成更高的伤害。==It is a strange sword Skill that costs life force, and each time it is used, it deals more damage.
一种以自身阵法为代价破除对手阵法的秘术。==A secret Skill to break an opponent's formation at the cost of one's own.
一种储存灵气以治疗自身的恢复类法术，应付持久战效果尤为显著。==A restorative spell that stores aura to heal oneself, particularly effective in protracted battles.
一种危险的植物，香味可以致幻，也因此有特殊的药效。被旁门左道之人用于某些仪式，但以特殊手法处理就可以用以炼丹。==A dangerous plant with a hallucinogenic scent and therefore a special medicinal effect. It is used in rituals by the heretics, but can be used to make Elixirs with special treatment.
一种叶子十分稀缺的草药，是非常难得的可培育品种。==A rare herb with very scarce leaves, a very rare cultivable species.
一种名为凤血果的草药，这种草药听说只有宁州的一些大派才会种植，在海上很难找到==A kind of herb called Phoenix Bloodberry, this kind of herb is said to be grown only by some big sects in Ningzhou and is hard to find at sea
一种名为混元果的草药，这种草药听说只有宁州的一些大派才会种植，在海上很难找到==A kind of herb called Chaosborn Fruit, this kind of herb is said to be grown only by some major sects in Ningzhou and is hard to find at sea
一种名为狼桃的草药，这种草药听说只有宁州的一些大派才会种植，在海上很难找到==A kind of herb called Lupus Peach, this herb is said to be grown only by some major sects in Ningzhou and is hard to find at sea
一种名为玉髓芝的草药，这种草药听说只有宁州的一些大派才会种植，在海上很难找到==A kind of herb called Jadecore Shroom, this kind of herb is said to be grown only by some big sects in Ningzhou and is hard to find at sea
一种名为血菩提的草药，这种草药听说只有宁州的一些大派才会种植，在海上很难找到==An herb called Blood Bodhi Fruit, which is said to be grown only by some of the major sects in Ningzhou and is difficult to find at sea
一种名为银精芝的草药，这种草药听说只有宁州的一些大派才会种植，在海上很难找到==A kind of herb called Silvergleam Shroom, this kind of herb is said to be grown only by some big sects in Ningzhou and is hard to find in the sea
一种名为阴凝草的草药，这种草药听说只有宁州的一些大派才会种植，在海上很难找到==A kind of herb called Netherborn Grass, this kind of herb is said to be grown only by some big sects in Ningzhou, and is hard to find at sea
一种在短时间内极速运转体内灵气的高深法门，只有高阶修士才能熟练掌握。==A profound Skill for operating the spiritual energy in the body at great speed within a short period of time, which can only be mastered by high-ranking cultivator.
一种将护体灵气收回以治疗自身的法门。==A Skill to heal oneself by withdrawing the aura from the body.
一种常见的仙草，常用于炼制清心静气用的丹药。但过量使用或会导致发呆，反应迟钝，短时间内修为停滞等情况==A common immortal herb, often used to make Elixirs to clear the mind and calm the qi. However, excessive use may lead to dullness, slow reactions and stagnation of cultivation for a short period of time
一种更难掌握的暗劲技巧，能够在对手体内停留更长的时间，造成的伤害也更高。==A more difficult to master dark energy Skill that stays inside the opponent for longer and deals more damage.
一种服用后能够快速恢复土系灵气的高品阶丹药，适合在连续作战时补充灵气。==A high grade elixir that can quickly restore earth aura after consumption, suitable for replenishing aura during continuous combat.
一种服用后能够快速恢复木系灵气的高品阶丹药，适合在连续作战时补充灵气。==A high-grade elixir that can quickly restore wood aura after consumption, suitable for replenishing aura during continuous combat.
一种服用后能够快速恢复水系灵气的高品阶丹药，适合在连续作战时补充灵气。==A high-grade elixir that can quickly restore water-based aura after consumption, suitable for replenishing aura during continuous combat.
一种服用后能够快速恢复火系灵气的高品阶丹药，适合在连续作战时补充灵气。==A high-grade elixir that can quickly restore fire-based aura after consumption, suitable for replenishing aura during continuous combat.
一种服用后能够快速恢复灵气的高品阶丹药，适合在连续作战时补充灵气。==This is a high grade elixir that can be taken to quickly restore aura and is suitable for replenishing aura in continuous combat.
一种服用后能够快速恢复金系灵气的高品阶丹药，适合在连续作战时补充灵气。==A high grade elixir that can quickly restore metal aura after consumption, suitable for replenishing aura during continuous combat.
一种极为诡异的火系法门，中招者将身中火毒，痛苦不堪。==An extremely bizarre fire Skill that causes pain and suffering to those who are struck by it.
一种极为阴冷的火系法门，中招者会被炙热与寒冷两种感受来回折磨，痛苦不堪。==An extremely cold and insidious fire spell, the victim will be tormented by the two sensations of heat and cold back and forth in agony.
一种极为阴毒的法门，能够夺他人灵气为己用。==An extremely insidious Skill that can take the aura of others for its own use.
一种极为高深的步伐，施展后能留下无数残影迷惑攻击对手，速度越快效果越好。==An extremely profound step that leaves countless Shadows to confuse the opponent, the faster the speed the better the effect.
一种极强的增幅法术，在积蓄力量后，后续的下一次攻击能够造成翻倍的伤害。==An extremely powerful spell that can double the damage of the next attack after the power has been built up.
一种用来保护经脉的秘术，仅能在结婴时使用。==A secret Skill used to protect the meridians.
一种用来治疗严重外伤的丹药，相比于普通的化瘀丹，药效更强。==An elixir used to treat severe trauma and is more potent than the normal Novice Healing Elixir.
一种用火铜布下的大阵，能够将阵法笼罩范围内化为一片高温的火海。==A large formation laid out with fire copper, capable of turning the area covered by the formation into a sea of hot fire.
一种用灵石布下的基础阵法，可以增加灵气汇聚的速度。==A basic formation made with spirit stones that increases the speed of the gathering of spiritual energy.
一种神奇的仙草，本身没有特别的效用，但成熟时会散发一种奇异的香味，吸引周围的妖兽争夺。用灵气激发或经过秘法炼制后，效果更佳，因此常被用来在无尽之海上猎杀妖兽。==A magical immortal herb that has no special effects in itself, but emits a strange fragrance when ripe, attracting the surrounding demon beasts to fight over it. It is often used to hunt demon beasts on the Endless Sea as it is more effective when stimulated with spiritual energy or refined by secret methods.
一种神秘的瞳术，习至大成后便可看破对手的法术神通。==A mysterious pupil Skill that, when practised to its fullest extent, can see through an opponent's spells and abilities.
一种能使施术者短时间内恢复意识，提升意志的秘术，仅能在结婴时使用。==A secret Skill that restores consciousness for a short period of time and enhances the will of the wielder.
一种能够在结丹时更为高效的运转体内灵气的秘术，仅能在结丹时使用。==A secret Skill that allows for more efficient operation of the spiritual energy in the body during the formation, and can only be used during the formation.
一种能够操控飞针伤人的法门。==A spell that can manipulate flying needles to injure people.
一种蕴含土灵气的丹药，服用后能提升在凝液成丹阶段对土系灵气的感知和运用。==An elixir containing earth aura, which, when taken, enhances the perception and use of earth aura at the Liquid Array stage.
一种蕴含土灵气的丹药，服用后能短暂大幅提升对土系灵气的感知和运用，且无副作用。==An elixir containing earth aura which, when consumed, will significantly improve the perception and use of earth aura for a short period of time, with no side effects.
一种蕴含土灵气的丹药，服用后能短暂提升使用土系法术的伤害。==An elixir containing earth aura which, when taken, will briefly increase the damage of earth-based spells.
一种蕴含土灵气的丹药，服用后能短暂提升对土系灵气的感知和运用，但有些许副作用不可多用。==An elixir containing earth aura, which briefly enhances the perception and use of earth aura, but has some side effects and should not be used more than once.
一种蕴含木灵气的丹药，服用后能提升在凝液成丹阶段对木系灵气的感知和运用。==An elixir containing wood aura, which can enhance the perception and use of wood aura at the Liquid Array stage.
一种蕴含木灵气的丹药，服用后能短暂大幅提升对木系灵气的感知和运用，且无副作用。==An elixir containing wood aura, which, when taken, can briefly and significantly improve the perception and use of wood aura, with no side effects.
一种蕴含木灵气的丹药，服用后能短暂提升使用木系法术的伤害。==An elixir containing wood aura which, when taken, briefly increases the damage of wood spells.
一种蕴含木灵气的丹药，服用后能短暂提升对木系灵气的感知和运用，但有些许副作用不可多用。==An elixir containing wood aura, which can briefly improve the perception and use of wood aura, but has some side effects and should not be used more than once.
一种蕴含水灵气的丹药，服用后能提升在凝液成丹阶段对水系灵气的感知和运用。==An elixir containing water aura, which can enhance the perception and use of water aura at the Liquid Array stage.
一种蕴含水灵气的丹药，服用后能短暂大幅提升对水系灵气的感知和运用，且无副作用。==An elixir containing water aura which, when consumed, can briefly and significantly enhance the perception and use of water aura without side effects.
一种蕴含水灵气的丹药，服用后能短暂提升使用水系法术的伤害。==An elixir containing water aura that, when taken, briefly increases the damage dealt with water spells.
一种蕴含水灵气的丹药，服用后能短暂提升对水系灵气的感知和运用，但有些许副作用不可多用。==An elixir containing water aura, which can briefly improve the perception and use of water aura, but has some side effects and should not be used more than once.
一种蕴含火灵气的丹药，服用后能提升在凝液成丹阶段对火系灵气的感知和运用。==An elixir containing Fire Aura, which can enhance the perception and use of Fire Aura at the Liquid Array stage.
一种蕴含火灵气的丹药，服用后能短暂大幅提升对火系灵气的感知和运用，且无副作用。==An elixir containing Fire Aura, which, when taken, can briefly and significantly enhance the perception and use of Fire Aura, with no side effects.
一种蕴含火灵气的丹药，服用后能短暂提升使用火系法术的伤害。==An elixir containing fire aura that briefly increases the damage dealt by using fire spells when taken.
一种蕴含火灵气的丹药，服用后能短暂提升对火系灵气的感知和运用，但有些许副作用不可多用。==An elixir containing fire aura, which can briefly improve the perception and use of fire aura, but has some side effects and should not be used more than once.
一种蕴含金灵气的丹药，服用后能提升在凝液成丹阶段对金系灵气的感知和运用。==An elixir containing metal aura, which can enhance the perception and use of metal aura at the liquid-forming stage.
一种蕴含金灵气的丹药，服用后能短暂大幅提升对金系灵气的感知和运用，且无副作用。==An elixir containing metal aura, it can briefly and significantly improve the perception and use of metal aura with no side effects.
一种蕴含金灵气的丹药，服用后能短暂提升使用金系法术的伤害。==An elixir containing metal aura that, when taken, briefly increases the damage dealt with metal spells.
一种蕴含金灵气的丹药，服用后能短暂提升对金系灵气的感知和运用，但有些许副作用不可多用。==A kind of elixir containing metal aura, which can briefly improve the perception and use of metal aura, but has some side effects and should not be used more than once.
一种隐匿自身踪迹的法门，但遇到神识高于自己的对手时就会被轻松识破。==A Skill to conceal one's traces, but it can be easily detected when one encounters an opponent with a higher Soul Sense than oneself.
一种飘忽不定，专注于攻击对手弱点的掌法。伤害不高但尤有妙用。==An erratic palm Skill that focuses on the opponent's weaknesses. It does not do much damage but is particularly useful.
一种食肉植物，用带粘液的异型叶子困住猎物，年份足够甚至能进食妖兽。==A carnivorous plant that traps prey with its slimy, shaped leaves and can even feed on demonic beasts when old enough.

No one else has found this place yet except you, so you decide...?
一阵轻柔的风刮过，你下意识地眯起双眼，模糊的视野中似乎有什么亮晶晶的东西随风飞来。==A gentle breeze blows by and you squint subconsciously as something bright and shiny flies in your blurred vision.
一面小镜，形状古拙，青铜镂边，上刻龙，下刻虎，镜上刻着八卦方位，中间镜片处却非一般铜镜，黄蒙蒙的看不清楚。==A small mirror, ancient in shape, with a bronze cut-out rim, engraved with a dragon at the top and a tiger at the bottom, the mirror is engraved with the eight trigrams of directions, but the middle lens is not a normal bronze mirror, yellow and hazy to see clearly.

一颗闪亮的流星自你面前划过，奇怪，白天也能见到这种天象吗？你定睛一看，一位金光万丈的修士乘着飞行法宝向附近的地面落去。细细数来，他身上单是显露出来的法宝便有十几件，俨然一个人型宝库。正是这些光辉让他看来活像颗流星，不过这位修士的境界似乎不高，不如...==A bright shooting star streaks past you. You look at it and see a golden-hued monk on a flying treasure descending towards the ground nearby. 人功==RenGong
人各有命数，你并不打算干涉他们的人生。正当你准备继续赶路时，一位衣着简朴的青年人站了出来：“在下张有忌，若各位信得过的话可依次从塔上跳下，我会接住你们！”这个办法可信度实在太低，你摇了摇头匆匆前往下一个目的地。\\n心境+3==People have their own destiny, and you do not intend to interfere with their lives. Just as you are about to continue your journey, a young man dressed in simple clothes comes forward: 'I am Zhang Youji, if you trust you can jump from the tower in turn, I will catch you!' The credibility of this approach is too low, you shake your head hurriedly to the next destination. \\n state of mind +3
人心险恶，这些劫匪也是咎由自取，你无视了刺耳的求救声，拂袖而去。\\n心境+1==The human heart is sinister, these robbers are also to blame, you ignore the piercing cry for help, brush off. \\n state of mind +1

你==You

The two monks are not repulsed, and when they see you join them, they are eager to share their views with you, hoping you will judge them. \\n You think about it and combine their insights to create another insight. The two monks are satisfied with the results and bid you farewell. \\nThoughts+1
你一时怒从中来，既气又恨。气自己时运不济，误入此妖领地。更恨自己实力不足，无法将此妖斩于剑下。\\n气血翻涌间你杀意大盛，堪堪领悟一丝剑道法门，你抓住这一瞬的体悟挥剑而出，一击将那天青翼蛇斩杀。\\n思绪+1==You momentarily anger from it, both angry and hate. Angry at yourself for being unlucky and entering this demon's territory by mistake. More hate their own strength is not enough, can not be this demon cut under the sword. \\n The lifeforce surges your killing intent flourished, can understand a trace of the sword dao method, you seize this moment of comprehension swing sword out, a blow will be that green winged snake killed. \\nThoughts+1
