前辈有何吩咐？若是无事，坐下聊聊可好？==What can I do for you? If there is nothing to do, would you like to sit down and have a chat?
前辈此举何意？==Senior, what do you mean by that?
前辈此举是因为遇到了难以启齿的困境么？那这{item}便让你拿去罢。==Is it because you are in a difficult situation? Then you can have the {item}.
前辈此举真如干天落慈雨，解我心头大患，多谢！==This is like the rain falling from the sky, it's a great relief to my heart.
前辈的财...哦不，性格深得我心，很高兴能与前辈结缘。==Elder's wealth... I'm glad to have a relationship with you.
前辈真会说笑。==Elder is really joking.
前辈真是别出心裁，只可惜这{item}在下暂时用不上。==It's a pity that I can't use this {item} for the time being.
前辈空有一身修为，却还是默默无闻，真是虚度岁月。==Elder has an empty cultivation but still remains in obscurity, what a waste of time.
前辈竟会为了{item}威胁我？这就是被好友背刺的感觉么，真是令人窒息的刺痛啊。==I don't know if I'm going to be able to get it. Is this what it feels like to be stabbed in the back by your best friend, what a breathless sting.
前辈若无要事，在下便先走一步了。==If senior doesn't have any tasks for me, I will leave first.
前辈若是再拿我说笑，头都给你打飞。==If senpai makes fun of me again, I'll blow your head off.
前辈莫非是认为戏弄我很有意思？==Do you think it is fun to tease me?
前辈言重了，不过是区区{item}，你若需要的话，拿去便是。==It's just a small {item}, if senior needs it, just take it.
前辈还是不要开这种玩笑比较好。==It is better for senior not to make such jokes.
前辈这是在在跟在下开玩笑吧？==You're joking with me, right?
前辈这是在在跟我开玩笑吧？==Senior, are you kidding me?
前辈这是在羞辱我么？==Is that a humiliation, senpai?
前辈这是要干什么？==What is senior doing here?
前辈，可莫要欺人太甚。==Don't force people too much, Senior.
前辈，可莫要欺人太甚为好。==Senior, don't force others too much.
前辈，您没事吧？==Are you alright, senior?

It used to open its doors every year to recruit Disciple, but in recent years it seems that for some reason it has refused to accept foreign visitors.

化尘教秘术，通过大阵操控巨量尘土不断形成护罩保护阵中之人。==A secret Skill of the Transmigration Earth Cult, which uses a huge amount of dust to form a constant shield to protect those in the formation.
化尘教秘术，通过大阵操控巨量尘土以攻击骚扰阵内的敌人。==The secret Skill of the Transmigration Earth Cult, which uses the formation to manipulate huge amounts of dust to attack and harass the enemy within the formation.
化尘教秘术，长时间积蓄力量后方可使用，威能恐怖。==This is a secret Skill of the Transmigration Earth Cult. It can only be used after a long period of time to build up strength and is extremely powerful.

十四==XIV
十岁那年，你在河流边捡到一枚神秘的贝壳。那时的你还不知道，贝壳中的神秘能量竟带给你化废为宝的神奇能力，使你能够吸收废丹中驳杂的能量，增进自身修为。==When you were ten years old, you found a mysterious seashell by a river. At that time, you did not know that the mysterious energy in the shell gave you the magical ability to turn waste into treasure, enabling you to absorb the branched energy in the waste Elixirs and improve your cultivation.

Simply wipe your eyes with the water that has absorbed the medicinal properties, and it will have a miraculous effect on clearing your eyes. Repeating this three to four times will even enable the eyes to develop some unimaginable and wonderful pupil skills.

地阶==Earthly
地阶上品遁术，施展后便可立于所持之剑上，以极快的速度自由飞行。==This is an upper-grade evasion Skill that allows you to fly freely at great speed on the sword you are holding.
地阶中庸类功法。==A middle-ranking Skill of the Earth class.
地阶中庸类功法，据说修炼后能够吸收天雷之力淬炼自身肉体。==A medium-grade cultivation Skill that is said to be able to absorb the power of heavenly thunder to refine one's flesh after cultivation.
地阶中庸类功法，是一种能够收敛自身气息的实用战斗类功法。。==It is also a practical combat Skill that allows one to collect one's breath.
地阶中庸类功法，本是魔门炼体功法，后被一名天赋异禀的元婴期大能改造成了修真界赫赫有名的一本地阶功法，但因为独特的副作用而鲜有人愿意修炼。==It was originally a devilish body refining Skill, but was later transformed by a gifted Nascent Soul stage powerhouse into a famous ground-level Skill in the cultivation world, but few people were willing to practise it because of its unique side effects.
地阶修炼类功法，同时也是一种高阶的运气法门，通过调度自身灵气来加速吸收灵气的速度。==It is also a high-ranking luck Skill that accelerates the absorption of spiritual energy by dispatching one's own spiritual energy.
地阶修炼类功法，积蓄力量以提升吸收灵气的速度。==A cultivation Skill of the Earth class that builds up strength to increase the speed of absorbing spiritual energy.
地阶修炼类功法，能够滋养修炼者的神识。==An earth-grade cultivation Skill that nourishes the practitioner's Soul Sense.
地阶修炼类功法，通过短时间内的龟息恢复自身状态。==A cultivation Skill of the Earth class that restores one's state through short periods of turtle breath.

地阶土系神通==Earth
地阶战斗类功法，以五行相生相克之理，御使剑诀更加强大。==The Earth-ranked Combat Skills are based on the principle that the five elements are related to each other, making the sword Skills even more powerful.
地阶战斗类功法，相传是一对关系极差的师兄弟所创，他们师承相同，所创功法的效果也大为相似，因此都认定是对方抄袭了自己。==It is said to have been created by a pair of brothers who were on very bad terms. They shared the same mastery and the effects of the Skills they created were very similar, so they both decided that the other had copied them.

天机阁收录的天阶中庸类功法，练至大成可在移动时幻化无数残影迷惑对手，闪避攻击。==The Heavenly Ji Pavilion contains the Heavenly Mediocre class Skills, which, when practised to their fullest extent, can disorientate opponents and evade attacks by creating countless Shadows while moving.
天机阁收录的天阶修炼类功法，修炼时能够将一部分灵气储存在周身穴位中，危难时刻引动这些灵气恢复生命力，是极为罕见的保命功法。==The Heavenly Cultivation Skill is a rare life-saving Skill that allows you to store a portion of your spiritual energy in the Acupuncture points around your body, and to invoke this energy to restore your life force in times of danger.
天机阁收录的天阶战斗类功法，能够通过独特运气提升法门伤害。==A Heavenly-ranked Combat-type gong method included in the Heavenly Qi Pavilion, capable of enhancing the damage of the method through unique luck.
天机阁每十年举办一次的拍卖大会，仅邀请金丹期以上修为的修士参加。==Once every ten years, the Tianji Pavilion organises an auction conference to which only cultivator with cultivation levels above the Golden Core stage are invited.

天色已晚，疲于赶路的你决定今晚在路旁的破庙借宿。寺庙中老旧的黄色经幡在夜风吹动下发出窸窣声响，伴着这样的声音你进入梦乡......\\n一觉醒来昨晚栖身的破屋突然变得富丽堂皇，佛像前的供桌上摆满了点心鲜果。睡了整晚的你此时饥肠辘辘，望着案上的贡品，你决定..==It is late, tired of rushing you decided to borrow a night in the roadside temple tonight. The old yellow sutra streamers in the temple rustle in the night breeze, and with such a sound you go to sleep ...... \\n woke up last night's shabby house suddenly became rich and magnificent, the Buddha statue in front of the table full of snacks and fresh fruit. After sleeping all night, you are now hungry, looking at the case of tribute, you decided to ...

天阶中庸类功法，又名《阵道》，实乃阵法一道的集大成之作，也是最出名的天阶功法之一。。==It is also known as the 'Dao of Array', which is actually a masterpiece of the Array Skill, and is one of the most famous Heavenly Rank Merit Methods.
天阶修炼类功法，据说是由龙族秘术传承而来。==A Heavenly-rank cultivation-type Skill, said to have been inherited from the secret arts of the Dragon Clan.

天魔眼==Heavenly Devil's Eye
天魔眼内处处都是危机，你还是决定在这为数不多的安全区域好好休息一番，恢复一下状态。==There are crises everywhere within the Heavenly Demon Eye, so you decide to take a good rest and recover in one of the few safe areas.
天魔眼外围==Outside the Eye of Heavenly Demons
天魔眼本是宁州一处极为富饶的灵脉所在。但不知从何时起，这里竟开始源源不断地产生魔气，并渐渐凝聚为一种奇异的魔物。如今的天魔眼虽然被各大门派与家族封印，但每过<color=#00757c>二十年</color>仍需派有<color=#00757c>筑基期</color>修为的弟子前去清缴。==The Heavenly Devil's Eye was originally a place of extremely rich spiritual veins in Ningzhou. But at some point in time, it began to produce a constant stream of demonic energy, which gradually coalesced into a strange demonic creature. Nowadays, although the Heavenly Devil's Eye is sealed by the major sects and families, every <color=#00757c>twenty years</color> still need to send Disciple with <color=#00757c>Foundation Establishment Stage</color> cultivation to clear it.
天魔眼每次只开放一个月，你不想把这珍贵的时间白白浪费，便转身离开了。==The Eye of Heavenly Demons is only open for a month at a time, and not wanting to waste this precious time, you turn to leave.

天魔道护法==Heavenly Demon Cult Dharmapala
天魔道秘传人阶战斗类功法，取义“引魔入体，唤魔重生”，修炼者修炼之后会将自己的肉身转化为魔体。==This is a secret human-ranked combat Skill of the Heavenly Demon Path, meaning 'to draw demons into the body, to call them back to life'.
天魔道秘传地阶战斗类功法，修炼者愈战愈勇，受伤越重战斗力越强。==The Heavenly Demon Path secretly transmits the ground level combat Skill, the more the practitioner fights, the heavier the injury, the stronger the combat power.

宁州古迹==Ningzhou Monuments
宁州古迹形成于上古时期的正魔大战，其中留存着不少法宝灵器与先人传承。每隔<color=#00757c>一千年</color>，空间壁垒薄弱之时，前往<color=#00757c>岫络谷</color>附近，凭金丹以上修为即可打开空间通道，进入宁州古迹所在的位面。==The monuments of Ningzhou were formed in the ancient times during the battle between the good and the devil, and there are many magic treasures and spiritual weapons and ancestors' legacy left in them. Every <colour=#00757c>1,000 years</colour>, when the space barrier is weak, you can go to the <colour=#00757c>Surrounding Valley</colour> and open a space channel to enter the realm where the Ningzhou monuments are located with your Golden Core or higher cultivation.
宁州各大主城将对你发起悬赏，你的声望越低，赏金越高。==The major main cities of Ningzhou will initiate a bounty on you, the lower your reputation, the higher the bounty.
宁州地图==Ningzhou Map
宁州大地的事件的发生与时间息息相关，而修炼经历事件同样会消耗时间，管理好的你的时间尤为重要。==The events of Ningzhou are closely related to time, and cultivating through events also consumes time, so it is important to manage your time well.
宁州大地，无数传说，有的传闻是有时效性的，你可以在传闻页面中查看事件的开启时间。==There are numerous legends in Ningzhou, some of which are time-sensitive, so you can check the opening times of events on the rumours page.

戒天==Rings of Heaven
战前使用消耗品==Use consumables before battle
战前准备==Pre-war preparation
战前可以使用丹药等消耗品，不同的物品有不同效果仅该场战斗生效。==You can use consumables such as elixirs before battle. Different items have different effects that are only effective for that battle.
战前可以查看敌人的功法、法术、装备，以进行策略调整。==You can check your enemy's skills, spells and equipment before the battle, so you can adjust your strategy.
战前查看==Checking before battle
战前调整==Pre-battle adjustments
战斗==Combat

战斗初始手牌数+2==Combat initial hand +2

据说结丹要经过碎丹和化婴两个阶段。想要成功结婴，不仅需要备足丹药，也需有结婴秘术辅助才行。==It's said that there are two stages to go through, breaking the core and forming the nascent soul. If you want to succeed in forming the nascent soul not only do you need to have sufficient preparation but also the correct secret methods.
据说结婴要经过碎丹和化婴两个阶段。想要成功结婴，不仅需要备足丹药，也需有结婴秘术辅助才行。==It is said that Nascent formation involves two stages, namely, the breaking of the Dan and the transformation into an Nascent. 据说这宁州古迹本就是位面塌陷而成，此次现世过后便因空间不稳彻底坍塌，再也无法进入了！唉，可惜了里面那些宝物......==It is said that this Ningzhou monument was created by the collapse of the realm, and after this appearance, it will collapse completely due to spatial instability, and will no longer be accessible! 武陵城<color=#00757c>每五年</color>将会举办一次“英杰会”，凡是40岁以下，炼气境界的修士都可以报名参加。英杰会比试的难度很高，但夺魁之人就可以获得一颗珍贵的“筑基丹”，因此每次都会吸引大批的青年才俊参与大比。==Every five years<color=#00757c>the Wuling City <color=#00757c>will hold a 'Yingjiejie' competition, which is open to all cultivator under the age of 40 and at the Qi Refinement realm. The competition is very difficult, but the winner will receive a precious 'Foundation Elixir', so every time a large number of young talents are attracted to participate in the competition.

法宝==Spellcraft
法宝分为符器、法器、法宝、纯阳法宝，通天灵宝五个阶段。==Magic treasures are divided into five stages: talisman, magic weapon, magic treasure, pure Yang magic treasure, and heavenly spiritual treasure.
法宝分为金木水火土五行、剑、神识以及混元等属性，同一武器可以不仅仅只有一个属性。==Artifacts can have the following attributes: Metal, Wood, Water, Fire, Earth, Sword, Soul and Chaos. The same weapon can have more than just a single attribute.

流云==Flowing Clouds
流传甚广的一本入门中庸类功法，修炼后有提气轻身的效果，是不错的逃遁手段。==A widely circulated introductory middle-grade Skill that has the effect of lifting Qi and lightening the body, making it a good means of escape.
流传甚广的一本入门修炼类功法，修炼时有凝神静气的功效，能够提升心境。==A widely circulated introductory cultivation Skill that has the effect of concentrating the mind and calming the spirit when practised, and can improve the state of mind.
流传甚广的一本入门战斗类功法，在修炼之时能够用灵力凝聚出灵甲，可谓保命的绝佳手段。==It is also a widely circulated introductory combat Skill, which can be used to create spiritual armour with spiritual energy, making it an excellent means of protecting one's life.
流传甚广的一本入门战斗类功法，能在对战时提升凝聚灵气的速度。==A widely circulated introductory combat-type gong method that can enhance the speed of gathering aura during sparring.
流传甚广的人阶修炼类功法，临战对敌时可调度周身灵气恢复气血。==It is also a widely used cultivation Skill of the human class, and can be used to restore one's lifeforce when fighting against an enemy.
流传甚广的人阶修炼类功法，修炼后能后提升神识。==This is a widely circulated human-ranked cultivation Skill that can be used to enhance the Soul Sense after cultivation.
流传甚广的地阶战斗类功法，练至大成可在体表形成一道护体罡气，自行运转。==This is a widely-transmitted earth-ranked combat Skill, which, when practised to its fullest extent, can form a protective body aura on the surface of the body that operates on its own.

固守==Entrenchment
鲲进入【固守】状态，使自身受到的所有伤害降低80%，且所有后续攻击伤害+4==Kun enters the 【Solid】 state, reducing all damage to himself by 80% and all damage from subsequent attacks by 4

渴海==Thirsty Sea
游历时刚好得了些宝贝，顺便给你寄了一份。==I just happened to get some treasures on my travels, so I sent you a copy by the way.
游历时发现一株{item}，但被后来者捷足先登，一番争斗后不但{item}被夺，还用尽浑身解数才侥幸逃离。==He found a plant of {item}, but he was preceded by someone who came after him, and after a fight, not only was the {item} taken from him, but he also managed to escape with all his might.
游历时发现一株{item}，却被守护妖兽偷袭，血战后重伤逃离。==He found a {item} plant while travelling, but was attacked by a guardian demon beast and fled after a bloody battle.
游历时发现极寒之地，欲寻仙草却因实力与准备不足而被迫撤离，还受寒气侵袭，乃至身受重伤。==He was forced to evacuate because of his lack of strength and preparation. He was also attacked by the cold air and was seriously injured.
游历时误入水火灵气相融奇境，欲寻仙草却因实力与准备不足而身受重伤，但也因祸得福，气血大增。==While travelling, he entered a strange place where water and fire auras merged together. He wanted to find the immortal grass but was seriously injured due to lack of strength and preparation.
游历时闯入兽王巢穴，因实力不足而诛妖不成反受重伤，用尽底牌方逃出生天。==He entered a beast king's lair during his travels and was seriously injured when he failed to kill the demon due to his lack of strength.
游戏中有12条大道，每条大道有着对应的悟道境界和大道天赋。\n\n<Title>悟道境界</Title>\n<Image>wudao1</Image>\n悟道境界代表着你对这条道的理解程度，分别为一窍不通、初窥门径、略有小成、融会贯通、道之真境、大道已成。\n感悟下的数值代表你当前的悟道经验，这通常是通过闭关感悟思绪，领悟突破功法神通积累的。\n各个悟道境界下的数值代表了达到这个境界所需要的悟道经验，在满足相应悟道经验后，悟道境界就会自动提升。\n\n<Title>悟道点</Title>\n<Image>wudao2</Image>\n境界的提升和任意一条大道达到融会贯通都会获得悟道点，另外悟道点的主要来源还有论道，通过论道积累悟道值，满足条件后就可以获得一个悟道点。\n\n<Title>大道天赋</Title>\n<Image>wudao3</Image>\n每条大道都有自己的天赋，在满足悟道境界的前提条件下，消耗悟道点就可以获得一个大道天赋，但是大道天赋也需要循序渐进，只有获得之上一个悟道境界任意一个天赋后才可以获得下一个境界的天赋。\n\n<Title>思绪</Title>\n<Image>wudao4</Image>\n通过游历和论道，可以获得思绪，闭关感悟思绪可以获得悟道经验。==There are 12 avenues in the game, and each avenue has a corresponding realm of enlightenment and avenue talent. \n\n<Title>The Realm of Enlightenment</Title>\n<Image>wudao1</Image>\nThe Realm of Enlightenment represents the level of your understanding of the path, which are: No Knowledge, First Glimpse of the Path, Slight Success, Integration, True Realm of the Path, and The Great Path has become. \n The value under perception represents your current experience of Dao enlightenment, which is usually accumulated through closed-door perception thoughts and comprehension of breakthrough gongfa divine abilities. \nThe value under each enlightenment realm represents the enlightenment experience needed to reach that realm, and the enlightenment realm will be automatically raised after the corresponding enlightenment experience is satisfied. \n\n<Title>Enlightenment Points</Title>\n<Image>wudao2</Image>\nThe elevation of the realm and the attainment of unity in any of the avenues will earn enlightenment points, in addition the main source of enlightenment points is also the Discourse, through which the enlightenment value is accumulated and an enlightenment point is earned when the conditions are met. \n\n<Title>Dao talent</Title>\n<Image>wudao3</Image>\nEach avenue has its own talent, in the fulfillment of the prerequisites of the realm of enlightenment, consume enlightenment points to obtain a talent of the avenue, but the talent of the avenue also needs to be progressive, only after obtaining any one talent of the previous realm of enlightenment can The next realm of talent can only be obtained after obtaining any talent from the previous realm of enlightenment. \n\n<Title>Thoughts</Title>\n<Image>wudao4</Image>\nThrough traveling and discussing the Dao, you can gain thoughts, and you can gain enlightenment experience by shutting down and feeling thoughts.

灵根==Spiritual Root
灵根决定了你能够抽到各系灵气牌的概率权重。==Spiritual roots determine the weighting of the probability that you will be able to draw aura cards of each lineage.
灵根属性由先天决定，后天极难更改，因此往往就决定了你日后修炼功法神通的倾向。你体内最为精纯的灵根属性是......？==Spiritual root attributes are determined by nature and are extremely difficult to change later in life, so they often determine your inclination to cultivate magical skills and abilities in the future. The most pure spiritual root attribute in your body is ......?
灵根是修仙的根本，对于大部分人来说，灵根自然是越精纯越好。你的灵根资质是...？==Spiritual roots are fundamental to immortal cultivation, and for most people, the purer the spiritual roots, the better naturally. Your Spiritual Root Aptitude is...?

炼丹长老==Elixir Refining Elder
炼体悟道心得==Body Enlightenment
炼体达到了活血的境界，你的肉身力量更强大了。==You have reached the realm of Blood Refinement, and your physical body has become more powerful.
炼体达到了淬体的境界，你的肉身力量更强大了。==Your body has reached the level of Body Tempering, and your physical strength has increased.
炼体达到了炼筋的境界，你的肉身力量更强大了。==Your body has reached the level of Tendon Refining, and your physical strength has increased.
炼体达到了炼骨的境界，你的肉身力量更强大了。==Refining your body has reached the realm of refining your bones, and your physical body is more powerful.
炼体达到了锻体的境界，你的肉身力量更强大了。==Your body has been refined to the level of Body Forging, and your physical strength has increased.
炼制丹药==Make a potion
炼制丹药时由于药性冲突，导致丹药无法凝聚成型，所形成的废丹。==A spent elixir formed when a clash of medicinal properties prevents the elixir from coalescing and forming.
炼制丹药时由于药性寒热未能中和，导致丹药无法凝聚成型，所形成的废丹。==A spent elixir formed when the cold and heat of the medicinal properties are not neutralised during the preparation of the elixir, resulting in the elixir being unable to coalesce and take shape.
炼制丹药时药力过剩所产生的药渣，没有什么作用。==The dregs of Elixirs produced by the excess of medicinal power in the making of Elixirs are of little use.
炼制丹药时，成丹的数量翻倍==Double the number of completed Elixirs when making Elixirs
炼制丹药有凝神守魄、增强神识的效果。==It is also used to make elixirs that have the effect of strengthening the spirit and strengthening the Soul Sense.

炼气==Tempering
炼气、筑基、金丹、元婴、化神...修真之人，逆天而行，追求的便是终有一天能够悟道飞升，褪凡为仙，修得长生。==Qi Refining, Foundation Establishment, Golden Core, Nascent Soul, God Transformation... Most cultivators face alot of hardship that's against them while in their quest to one day achieve enlightenment and ascend to immortality, living a reclusive life leading into immortality and achieving eternal life.

炼气达到归一的境界，施展神通功法皆蕴含独特的天地法则，威能大增。==When you reach the state of Refining Qi, you will be able to perform magic Skills that contain the unique laws of heaven and earth, which will greatly increase your power.
炼气达到抱朴的境界，气海中能够凝聚更多灵气。==When Qi refinement reaches the realm of Embracing Purity, one is able to gather more Spiritual Qi in the Sea of Qi.
炼气达到易脉的境界，气海的容量大幅提升。==When Qi refinement reaches the realm of Easy Veins, the capacity of the Qi Sea is greatly increased.
炼气达到易脉的境界，能够通过不断运转周天，在气海中凝聚更多灵气。==When Qi refinement reaches the realm of Easy Veins, one is able to gather more spiritual Qi in the Sea of Qi by constantly running the Circumference.
炼气达到走穴的境界，自身经脉与气海都得到了扩充。==Qi refinement reaches the realm of walking through Acupuncture Points, and one's meridians and qi seas are expanded.

由化尘教神兵阁长老所炼制的下品法宝，其上铭刻聚灵符文。==A lower grade magic treasure made by the Elder of the Divine Arms Pavilion of the Transmigration Earth Cult, with the Spirit Gathering Rune inscribed on it.
由十大先天灵竹之一的苦竹炼制而成，可封人六感，任人宰割。==Refined from Bitter Bamboo, one of the Ten Great Innate Spirit Bamboos, it can seal one's six senses and leave one at the mercy of others.
由外而内，锻体炼气。==From the outside to the inside, forging the body and refining the qi.
由天外的陨铁打造而成的符剑，剑身重达百斤，只有修真者通过灵力方可驱使==Made from meteorite iron from beyond the sky, this sword weighs a hundred pounds and can only be used by a practitioner with spiritual power.
由御剑门流传出的二品丹药，以特殊手法培育的灵材之中蕴含剑气，以此材料来炼制的丹药，服用者即使不是剑修也可以产生剑气。==A second-rate elixir handed down from the Imperial Sword Sect. The elixir is made from spirit materials cultivated with special Skills that contain sword qi, so that even non-sword practitioners can produce sword qi.
由数名星河剑派弟子联手施展的剑阵，一旦入阵就会收到连绵不绝的攻击。==A sword formation performed by several Star River Sword Sect Disciple, once they enter the formation they will receive continuous attacks.
由数名金虹剑派弟子联手施展的剑阵，一旦入阵就会收到连绵不绝的攻击。==A sword formation performed by several Golden Rainbow Sword School Disciple who join forces to receive continuous attacks once they enter the formation.
由昊阳鸟长翎、乌风尾部的凤翎等七种珍稀灵兽的羽毛炼制而成，战斗中主动使用，对敌方释放一次【火弹】。==Made from the feathers of seven rare spirit beasts, including the long plume of the Hao Yang bird and the phoenix plume from the tail of the Wu Feng, it is used actively in battle and releases 【Fire Pellet】 once on the enemy.
由星河剑派神兵阁弟子所炼制的上品符器，其上铭刻聚灵符文。==A top-grade talisman weapon made by a disciple of the Divine Warrior Pavilion of the Star River Sword School, with spirit gathering runes inscribed on it.
由星河剑派神兵阁弟子所炼制的上品符器，其上铭刻青龙灵纹，灵力更加强大，但对使用者也要求更高。==A top-grade talisman weapon made by a disciple of the Divine Warrior Pavilion of the Star River Sword School, inscribed with the Green Dragon spirit inscription.
由星河剑派神兵阁执事所炼制的上品法器，其上铭刻聚灵符文。==A top-grade magic weapon made by the Deacon of the Divine Weapon Pavilion of the Star River Sword School, inscribed with the Spirit Gathering Rune.

'The heart of a poisonous augur is still like iron, and the blood of the augur is buried for a long time before it turns into phosphorus.'
由武陵城流传出的三品丹药，以特殊手法培育的灵材之中蕴含剑气，以此材料来炼制的丹药，服用者即使不是剑修也可以产生不少剑气。==A third-grade elixir handed down from Wuling City. The elixir is made from spirit materials cultivated with a special Skill that contain sword qi, and can produce a lot of sword qi even if the person taking it is not a sword practitioner.
由毒蛟内丹炼制而成，通体碧绿，大如龙眼，使用法术驱动，便可散发毒雾。==Made from the inner elixir of a poisonous scaly dragon, it is as big as a dragon's eye and can be driven by magic to emit poisonous mist.
由氤氲的碧玉打造而成的符剑，因材料脆弱对制剑者要求很高，而对其中毒性的运用也对施术者的水平提出了要求==Made of dense jasper, this sword is a delicate material that requires a high level of skill, as well as a high level of skill in the use of its poison.

神识系人阶战斗类功法，一种能在短时间内提升神识伤害的秘术，但使用后也会对自身神识有所损伤。==The Soul Sense System is a human-ranked combat Skill that can increase the damage to the Soul Sense for a short period of time, but it can also damage the Soul Sense after use.
神识系技能伤害变为真实伤害。==The damage of the Soul Sense skill becomes real damage.
神识系法术，一种能在短时间内提示神识攻击威能的法术，但使用后会对自身神识产生一定损害。==A spell that prompts the power of a Soul Sense attack for a short period of time, but will damage your own Soul Sense after use.
神识系法术，使用时十分隐蔽，难以被发现，因此常常被用于暗杀。==A Soul Sense spell that is very stealthy and difficult to detect, and is therefore often used for assassination.
神识系法术，对神识力量弱于自身的敌人效果尤为显著。==This spell is particularly effective against enemies whose Soul Sense is weaker than one's own.
神识系法术，神识越高，威能也越大。==The higher the Soul Sense, the more powerful it is.
神识系法术，能够临时凝聚精神，提升神识。==A spell of the Soul Sense system that temporarily gathers the spirit and enhances the Soul Sense.

神识系法术，能够直接攻击对方的神识。==A Soul Sense spell that directly attacks the opponent's Soul Sense.

离火门==The Fire Free Sect
离火门主修火系功法，是宁州五大门派之一。虽然他们从不拒绝散修拜入宗门，但因为恶劣的环境，也很少有人能够在那里坚持下来。==The Free Fire Sect majored in fire-based Skills and was one of the five major sects in Ning Prefecture. Although they have never refused to allow casual practitioners to join the sect, few have been able to stick around there because of the harsh environment.
离火门以火麟玉炼制的火系法宝，使佩戴者周身充斥着火灵气，同时也能够规避凡火的伤害有辟火的效果。==The fire magic treasures refined by the Fire Linn Jade of the Lihue Sect flood the wearer's body with fire aura, while also being able to circumvent the damage of mortal fire having the effect of warding off fire.
离火门供奉==Heavenly Fire Sect Dharmapala
离火门信物==A token of the Free Fire Sect

离火门护山大阵。\n战斗开始时增加遁速；\n前三回合获得一定焰，每回合递减；\n前三回合获得一定火灵气和木灵气，每回合递减。==The Great Mountain Protection Formation of the Fire-Leaf Sect. \nIncreases speed at the start of battle; \nGains a certain amount of flame for the first three rounds, decreasing each round; \nGains a certain amount of fire aura and wood aura for the first three rounds, decreasing each round.
离火门掌门==Heavenly Fire Sect Headmaster
离火门普通弟子穿的道袍，外门弟子只能以铠甲来代替火麒麟鳞片，但是内在细致的降温法阵让这款道袍非常舒适==The robe worn by the ordinary Disciple of the Fire Free Sect has to be replaced by armour, but the inner cooling spell makes this robe very comfortable.

离火门炼丹房==The Alchemy Room of the Fireless Sect
离火门焦飞自创的法术，由木生火，更能提升其火系法术的威能。==A spell created by Jiao Fei of the Free Fire Sect, which produces fire from wood and enhances the power of his fire spells.
离火门的入门剑招==The Sword Stance of the Fire Clan
离火门的制式法器，用料虽是普通，但于麒麟火中淬炼而成，深得离火门普通弟子喜爱。==This is the standard weapon of the Heavenly Fire Sect. Although it is made of ordinary materials, it is refined in the Qilin fire and is much loved by the Disciple of the Heavenly Fire Sect.
离火门的特色法宝，剑身融入火麒麟鳞片，以麒麟火淬炼之后更是剑气逼人。==A special magic weapon of the Free Fire Sect, the sword is infused with fire qilin scales and is even more powerful after being refined with qilin fire.
离火门神兵阁==The Divine Armour Pavilion of the Fire of the Fire
离火门秘传地阶中庸类功法，是门内为数不多的防御形功法。==It is one of the few defensive Skills in the Sect.
离火门秘传地阶战斗类功法。==The Fire Clan's secret ground-level combat Skill.
离火门秘传地阶战斗类功法，对敌时能愈战愈强，更因火云老祖的强大实力而闻名天下。==It is one of the few defensive Skills in the sect. It is also known for the great strength of Patriarch Flamecloud.
离火门秘传天阶中庸类功法。==The secret Heavenly Mediocre class Skill of the Free Fire Sect.
离火门秘传天阶战斗类功法。==The secret Heavenly Combat Skill of the Free Fire Sect.
离火门秘传天阶战斗类功法，能够大幅提升火系伤害，因其极为霸道的破坏力而闻名天下。==The Fire Clan's secret Heavenly Combat Skill is famous for its overwhelming destructive power and its ability to greatly enhance fire damage.
离火门秘术，临时改变灵气的运行路线，运用得当便可在对战中提升吸收灵气的速度。==A secret art of the Fire Clan that temporarily alters the path of the aura, and can be used to increase the speed of aura absorption in combat.
离火门秘术，极少有人能掌握的一种神秘法门。==A mysterious Skill rarely mastered by anyone.
离火门秘术，能够以灼烧自身代价抽取更多的火系灵气。==This is a secret Skill of the Free Fire Sect, which can extract more fire aura at the cost of burning oneself.
离火门秘术，能够提升碎丹结婴时的成功率，仅能在结婴时使用。==A secret Skill of the Free Fire Sect, which can increase the success rate when breaking dan and forming an Nascent.
离火门秘术，通过吞噬火焰以增强火系法术威能。==A secret Skill of the Free Fire Sect, which enhances the power of fire spells by swallowing flames.

禾山道秘技，能够直接攻击敌方最脆弱的神识，对神识力量弱于自身的敌人效果尤为显著。==A secret Skill of the Harvest Mountain Sect that directly attacks the enemy's most vulnerable Soul Sense, and is particularly effective against enemies whose Soul Sense is weaker than one's own.
禾山道秘技，被炼化的阴魂可以穿墙越室，无影无踪，使人防不胜防。==This is a secret Skill of the Harvest Mountain Sect. The refined spirit can pass through walls and rooms without a trace, making it impossible to defend against.

竹山宗、广陵城交界==Junction of Bamboo Mountain Clan and Guangling City
竹山宗主修木系功法，是宁州五大门派之一，传承悠久，据说已有数十万年的历史了，他们目前似乎正在搭设擂台，招收外门弟子。==The Bamboo Mountain Sect is one of the five major sects in Ningzhou, with a long heritage, said to be hundreds of thousands of years old, and it seems that they are currently setting up a ring to recruit outer Disciple.
竹山宗传功长老==The Bamboo Mountain Sect Skill/Inner Transmitting Elder
竹山宗传承万年，但有不少的功法与神通已经失传。或许能够在宁州古迹中找回那些丢失的传承。==The Bamboo Mountain Sect has been passed down for thousands of years, but many of its Skills and magical powers have been lost. Perhaps the lost heritage can be recovered from the Ningzhou monuments.

筑基期熊类妖兽，五行属水。毛如霜甲，辟火畏土；爪如利刃，穿甲透体。==Foundation Establishment Bears are water beasts of the five elements. Their fur is like frost armour, and they are resistant to fire and earth; their claws are like sharp blades, which penetrate their bodies.
筑基期爬行类异兽，五行属土。其身覆厚甲，头长易角，身形缓慢而力大无穷。==Foundation-stage reptilian beasts are of the five elements of earth. Their bodies are covered with thick armour and their heads have long horns, and they are slow and powerful.
筑基期狐类妖兽，其身覆白若雪，四足呈黑，如雪中寻墨玉。神识不足者见之难以自持。==Fox-like demonic beasts of the Foundation Establishment stage are white as snow and black on all four feet, like finding ink jade in snow. It is difficult for those who do not have enough Soul Sense to hold their own.
筑基期狼类妖兽，五行属金。生有三目，其竖瞳者能预知危险。宁州大陆最为常见的妖兽。==The wolf-like demonic beast at the Foundation Establishment stage is of the five elements of metal. They have three eyes and their vertical pupils can foresee danger. It is the most common demonic beast in the Ningzhou continent.
筑基期猴类妖兽，生有三目，其竖瞳者能预知危险，且身形敏捷，擅窃。==Monkeys in the Foundation Establishment stage have three eyes, and their vertical pupils can foresee danger and are agile and good at stealing.
筑基期猿类妖兽，五行属金，敏捷擅避，擅长持久战。==Foundation-stage ape-like demonic beasts, with five elements of metal, are agile and good at evasion, and good at enduring battles.
筑基期虎类妖兽，背插双翅，擅神识攻击，擅夺灵气，非神修者难敌。==The tiger-like demonic beast at the Foundation Establishment stage has two wings on its back and is good at attacking with Soul Sense and capturing spiritual energy.
筑基期蛛类妖兽，五行属木，腹有丝囊，能吐丝制敌，生有利齿，含毒。==Foundation Establishment Arachnids are wood beasts with silk sacs in their bellies that can spit out silk to control their enemies, and have sharp teeth that contain poison.
筑基期蝎类妖兽，五行属火，多见于火灵气旺盛的山地。擅用巨螯和尾针攻击。==Foundation Establishment Scorpions are fire beasts and are found in mountainous areas where fire aura is strong. They are good at attacking with their giant cheeks and tail needles.
筑基期蟒类妖兽，五行属木，多见于毒瘴密布之地。擅毒。==Foundation Establishment pythons are wood in all five elements and are often found in places where there is a poisonous miasma. They are good at poison.
筑基期蟒类妖兽，五行属水，长居江泽左近。生有利齿，内含剧毒。==Foundation building stage pythons, five elements of water, live in the left side of rivers and swamps. It has sharp teeth and is highly poisonous.
筑基期蟒类妖兽，五行属火。生长于火灵之地，惯于将猎物缠而噬之。==Foundation-stage pythons are of the five elements of fire. It grows in the land of fire spirits and is used to wrapping its prey around it and devouring it.
筑基期蟾类妖兽，周身似玉，其坚难催，擅于卸力。==Foundation building stage toad-like demonic beasts, their bodies resemble jade, but they are hard to push, and are good at unloading force.
筑基期金系修士==metal cultivator Foundation Establishment Stage
筑基期鳄类妖兽，五行属土，沼泽周遭偶有见之。擅用坚如磐石的长尾横扫，巨力加持之下难以抵挡。==Foundation building stage crocodiles are earthy in nature and can be found occasionally around swamps. It specialises in sweeping with its rock-solid tail, which is difficult to resist with its enormous strength.
筑基林==Lin Foundation Establishment Stage

结元婴==Nurturing the Nascent Soul
结婴会经过碎丹和化婴两个阶段。除了事先备齐“大活络丹”和“大醒神丹”，还需多多收集辅助结丹的秘术才行。==Nascent formation goes through two stages, namely, the breaking of the Dan and the transformation of the Nascent. 结婴成功，恭喜。==Congratulations on the success of the Nascent Soul formation.
结婴时若是经脉寸断，尽管突破失败但还是能够保存性命。但要是沉沦于心魔幻象而意志溃散，那就回天乏术咯！==If the meridians are broken at the time of formation, one can still save one's life despite a failed breakthrough. But if you fall into the illusion of a demon and your will falls apart, then there is no way back!
结婴最重要的便是经脉强韧，否则碎丹时经脉寸断的痛苦非常人所能忍受。不过据说平日里体道与气道修炼有成者，经脉的承受能力也会更加强大。==The most important thing for nascent formation is that the meridians are strong, otherwise the pain of breaking the meridians is unbearable. However, it is said that those who are successful in the cultivation of the Body and Qi Dao will also have stronger meridians.
结婴最重要的便是经脉强韧，否则碎丹时经脉寸断的痛苦非常人所能忍受。不过若是平日里体道与气道修炼有成，经脉的承受能力也会更加强大。==The most important thing for nascent formation is that the meridians are strong, otherwise the pain of breaking the meridians is unbearable. However, it is said that those who are successful in the cultivation of the Body and Qi will have more resilient meridians..

薄发==Thin Hair

金丹期==Golden Core Stage Stage
金丹期允许购买白帝楼的不传绝学与独门功法。==The Golden Dan stage allows the purchase of the White Emperor House's untold mastery and unique techniques.
金丹期剑系修士==Golden Core Stage Sword cultivator
金丹期土系修士==Golden Core Stage Earth cultivator
金丹期地龙类妖兽，五行属土，辟水畏木，皮如坚甲，击之自伤，其势如厚土，久而愈强。==At the Golden Core stage, earth dragons are earthy in all five elements, warding off water and fearing wood, with skin like solid armour, which is self-injurious when struck.
金丹期地龙类海兽，五行属土。进可以神通裂地，退可以尾卸力。==At the Golden Core stage, the Earth Dragon is an earth-like sea creature with five elements. They can enter with their magic powers and split the ground, and retreat with their tails.
金丹期急需突破者==Golden Core Stage cultivator who urgently needs a breakthrough
金丹期普通修士==Golden Core Stage Normal cultivator
金丹期木系修士==Golden Core Stage Wood cultivator
金丹期水系修士==Golden Core Stage Water cultivator
金丹期浮游类海兽。性温和，浮游于海上，遇敌则以毒针反击。==Floating sea creatures of the Golden Core stage. Mild in nature, they float on the sea and counterattack with poisonous needles when they encounter an enemy.
金丹期火系修士==Golden Core Stage Fire cultivator
金丹期炼丹修士==Golden Core Stage Elixir Refiner cultivator
金丹期炼器修士==Golden Core Stage Weaponry Refiner cultivator
金丹期虫类妖兽，五行属金，辟木畏火。双翅六足，生有大颚擅破甲。==Insect-like demonic beasts at the Golden Core stage are of the five elements of metal, and can ward off wood and fear fire. It has two wings and six legs, and a large jaw that is good at breaking armour.
金丹期虾类海兽，五行属木。头有尖刺，触之流血，又擅以神通驭使海流窃取敌方灵气。==Golden Core stage shrimp-like sea creature, the five elements are wood. They have spikes on their heads that bleed when touched, and they are also good at using their magic powers to harness the currents of the sea to steal the enemy's spiritual energy.
金丹期蛇类妖兽，五行属木，辟土畏金，擅驱藤。==At the Golden Core stage, snakes are woods in the five elements, and are good at repelling vines.
金丹期蛛类妖兽，六目八足，其神念如潮，擅神识攻击。==At the Golden Core stage, spiders are six-eyed and eight-legged demonic beasts, with their soul energy like a tidal wave, good at Soul Sense attacks.
金丹期蛟类妖兽，五行属水，辟火畏土，可用神通驱使狂澜，纷涌而至，亦擅毒。==At the Golden Core stage, Jiao-type demonic beasts, whose five elements are water, are resistant to fire and fear earth, and can use their magical powers to drive wild waves to come and go, and are also good at poison.
金丹期蝎类妖兽，五行属火，辟金畏水。高等炎蝎，擅用巨螯和尾针攻击，受击易灼伤。==Scorpion-like demonic beasts at the Golden Core stage are of the five elements of fire, and are capable of repelling metal and fearing water. They are good at attacking with their giant cheeks and tail needles, and are easily burned by blows.
金丹期蟒类海兽，五行属金。能口吐灵雾伤敌，且回复自身==The pythons are sea creatures of the Golden Core stage, with five elements of metal. It can spit out spiritual fog to injure the enemy and restore itself.
金丹期蟹类海兽，五行属水，因常见于蓬莎海域而得名。其双螯坚硬无比，可攻可守。==The crab-like sea creature of the Golden Core stage is of the five elements of water, so named because it is commonly found in the Pongsha sea. Its cheeks are incredibly hard and can attack or defend.
金丹期蟾类海兽，五行属火，流涎似火，受击易灼伤。==The Toad-like sea creature of the Golden Core stage is of the five elements of fire, salivating like fire and easily burned by blows.
金丹期贝类海兽，五行属土。以坚壳护身，且擅持久战。==Shellfish sea creatures of the Golden Core stage are of the five elements of earth. They protect themselves with their shells and are good at enduring battles.
金丹期软体类海兽。生有八爪，遇敌时则以之抽击。==Soft-bodied sea creatures of the Golden Core stage. They have eight claws and strike with them when they encounter an enemy.
金丹期金系修士==Golden Core Stage metal cultivator
金丹期马类妖兽，其身形敏捷，擅窃，且擅持久战。==At the Golden Core stage, the horse-like beast is agile, good at stealing and good at enduring battles.
金丹期鱼类海兽，五行属火。擅爆发，但耐力较差。==The Golden Core stage fish sea creatures are of the five elements of fire. They are good at exploding, but have poor endurance.
金丹期鲲类海兽，五行属水，肉身强大，擅擭取周遭灵气强化自身。==Kun-like sea creatures of the Golden Core stage, with five elements of water, are powerful in their flesh, and are good at taking spiritual energy from the surrounding area to strengthen themselves.
金丹期鹏类神兽，速度极快，能抟扶摇而上规避攻击。==Golden Core stage roc-like beasts are extremely fast and can evade attacks by flying upwards.
金丹期龙类神兽，五行属土，皮如坚甲，击之自伤，颈有逆鳞，触之则怒。==The five elements of the Dragon divine Beast at the Golden Elixir stage are earth, and its skin is like solid armour.
金丹期龙类神兽，五行属木，皮如坚甲，击之自伤，颈有逆鳞，触之则怒。==Dragon beasts of the Golden Elixir stage are of the five elements of wood, with skin like solid armour, which hurts when struck and scales on the neck, which makes them angry when touched.
金丹期龙类神兽，五行属水，皮如坚甲，击之自伤，颈有逆鳞，触之则怒。==Dragon beasts of the Golden Elixir stage are of the five elements of water, with skin like solid armour, which hurts when struck, and scales around the neck, which causes anger when touched.
金丹期龙类神兽，五行属火，皮如坚甲，击之自伤，颈有逆鳞，触之则怒。==Dragon beasts of the Golden Elixir stage are of the five elements of fire, with skin like solid armour.

门派==The Sect
门派每三十年会举办一次<color=#00757c>宗门大比</color>，所有练气期的弟子都可以参与。凡是在大比中表现出色的，都可以获得一枚筑基丹作为奖励。若是外门弟子夺魁者，则可以直晋升为内门弟子，拜入门派中任一一位长老门下修习。==The <color=#00757c>Clan Grand Competition</color> is held every 30 years and all Qi training stage Disciple can participate. Anyone who performs well in the competition will receive a Foundation Elixir as a reward. If an outer disciple wins the championship, he or she can be promoted straight to inner disciple and study under any of the Elder in the sect.
闪避下一次受到的技能伤害。==Dodges the next skill damage taken.

领悟==Enlightenment
领悟《炼器入门》，将器道提升至初窥门径。==Comprehend the 'Introduction to Weaponry Refining' and upgrade your weapon dao to a first glimpse.
领悟了两仪之道，驱使阵法攻击敌人时威能大增。==Having understood the Way of the Two Rites, the power of the formation is greatly increased when it is used to attack the enemy.
领悟了八卦之道，学会利用阵法之利保护自身。==Having learned the Way of the Eight Trigrams, you learn to use the benefits of formations to protect yourself.
领悟了冰冻之道，举手间便可施展强力的冰冻法术。==Having understood the Way of Freezing, you can cast powerful freezing spells with a single hand.
领悟了冰肌之道，寻常刀剑法术无法伤到你分毫。==Having comprehended the Way of Ice Muscle, ordinary swords and spells cannot harm you in the slightest.
领悟了冲穴之道，学会利用这个特殊的技巧治疗自身。==Understood the Way of Punching Points, learning to use this special Skill to heal oneself.
领悟了凝脉之道，学会利用玄冰之力使对手无法顺利运转灵气。==Having learned the Way of the Chakra, you learn to use the power of ice to prevent your opponent from running their aura smoothly.
领悟了化劲的技巧，学会使用接化发的巧劲抵御对手的攻势。==The ability to use the art of transformation to defend against an opponent's attack.
领悟了化焰之道，学会将自身完全融入灵气火焰，并进一步增强法术的威能。==With the Way of the Flame, you learn to fully immerse yourself in aura flames and further enhance the power of your spells.
领悟了厚积薄发之道，学会利用土系法术的特性为你积蓄力量。==Having learned the Way of the Earth, you learn to use the properties of earth spells to build up your strength.
领悟了厚重之道，学会运用土系灵气的特性增强防御。==Having understood the Way of Thickness, one learns to use the properties of earth aura to enhance defence.
领悟了吞焰之道，吞噬自身的灵气火焰便可有疗伤的功效。==Having understood the Way of Devouring Flame, one can devour one's own aura flames to heal wounds.
领悟了四象之道，学会利用阵法凝聚的天地灵气，化作灵气护罩保护自身。==Having understood the Way of the Four Elephants, you learn to use the aura of heaven and earth gathered by the formation to protect yourself as an aura shield.
领悟了坚毅之道，在蓄势状态下受到的伤害降低。==Having learned the Way of Perseverance, you can take less damage while in Stance.
领悟了奇门之道，对于如何驱动阵法有了更深刻的理解。==Having comprehended the Way of Qi Men, you have a deeper understanding of how to drive formations.
领悟了寄生之道，学会通过木系缠绕神通吸取对手的精血。==Having understood the Way of Parasitism, he learns to suck the blood of his opponents through his wood entanglement magic.
领悟了幻身之道，施展遁术后将化作残影，神鬼莫测。==With the realization of the Way of Illusionary Body, you will transform into a stigmatized Shadow when you cast a transporting Skill, which is unpredictable.
领悟了强土之道，学会运用五行相生的技巧增强法术威能。==Having learnt the Way of Strong Earth, I have learnt to use the five elements to enhance the power of my spells.
领悟了强木之道，学会运用五行相生的技巧增强法术威能。==I have learnt the Way of Strong Wood, and have learnt to use the Five Elements to enhance the power of my spells.
领悟了强水之道，学会运用五行相生的技巧增强法术威能。==Having learnt the Way of Strong Water, I have learnt to use the five elements to enhance the power of my spells.
领悟了强火之道，学会运用五行相生的技巧增强法术威能。==Having learned the Way of Strong Fire, I have learned to use the Five Elements to enhance the power of my spells.
领悟了强金之道，学会运用五行相生的技巧增强法术威能。==Having learnt the Way of Strengthening metal, one learns to use the Skills of the five elements to enhance the power of spells.
领悟了归尘之道，能够源源不断将天地间的灵气转换为可供你操控的灵气尘土。==Having learned the Way of Returning Dust, you are able to continuously transform the aura of heaven and earth into aura dust that you can manipulate.
领悟了御土之道，学会运用土系灵气抵御水系伤害。==Having comprehended the Way of the Earth, one learns to use earth aura to resist water damage.
领悟了御木之道，学会运用木系灵气抵御土系伤害。==Having understood the Way of Wood, you have learned to use wood aura to defend yourself against earth damage.
领悟了御水之道，学会运用水系灵气抵御火系伤害。==Having comprehended the Way of Water, one learns to use water-based auras to defend against fire-based damage.
领悟了御火之道，学会运用火系灵气抵御金系伤害。==You have understood the Way of Fire, and have learned to use fire aura to defend against metal damage.
领悟了御金之道，学会运用金系灵气抵御木系伤害。==I have learnt the Way of Imperial metal, and have learnt to use metal aura to defend against wood damage.
领悟了心听之道，与人斗法时能不断壮大自身神魂。==Having understood the Way of Heart Hearing, you can grow your soul when fighting with others.
领悟了扬沙之道，操控尘土时亦能在周身形成一道防御。==Having understood the Way of Raising Sand, one can also form a defence around one's body when manipulating dust.
领悟了敛息之道，隐匿时偷袭对手能够造成更高的伤害。==Having understood the Way of Breath Convergence, you are able to inflict higher damage when stealthily attacking your opponent.
领悟了流水之道，学会利用连续不断的法术造成更多伤害。==With the Way of Flowing Water, you learn to use continuous spells to deal more damage.
领悟了浴火之道，寻常火焰对你来说不再是威胁，反而能够恢复自身气血。==If you have learned the Way of the Bathing Fire, normal flames will no longer be a threat to you, and will be able to restore your lifeforce.
领悟了滴水穿石之道，学会利用连续不断的法术造成更多伤害。==Having learnt the Way of Dripping Water Penetrating Stone, he learns to use continuous spells to inflict more damage.
领悟了炙火之道，学会运用极为高温的法术火焰灼烧对手。==Having learned the Way of Scorching Fire, he learns to use extremely hot spells to scorch his opponents.
领悟了生土之道，能够更容易的吸收天地间的土系灵气。==Having learned the Way of the Living Earth, you can more easily absorb the earth aura of heaven and earth.
领悟了生水之道，能够更容易的吸收天地间的水系灵气。==With the understanding of the Way of Living Water, you can absorb the water aura of heaven and earth more easily.
领悟了生火之道，能够更容易的吸收天地间的火系灵气。==With the understanding of the Way of Fire, you can absorb the fire aura of the world more easily.
领悟了生金之道，能够更容易的吸收天地间的金系灵气。==Understood the Way of the Living metal, enabling you to absorb the metal aura of heaven and earth more easily.
领悟了相生之道，使你能够更为高效的运转与吸收天地间的五行灵气。==You have learned the Way of Sang Sang, which allows you to operate and absorb the five elements of heaven and earth more efficiently.
领悟了蓄势之道，学会在运转灵气的同时积蓄力量。==I have learnt the Way of Storing Momentum, and have learnt to build up strength as I run my Qi.
领悟了观气之道，学会通过独特的度气法门凝聚护罩。==You have understood the Way of Qi Viewing and have learnt to form a shield through a unique qi-defying Skill.
领悟了轻身之道，能够更好的施展与运用一些基础的遁术。==Having comprehended the Way of Light Body, you are better able to perform and use some basic evasion Skills.
领悟了锻金之道，学会利用金系灵气的特性为你积蓄力量。==You have learned the Way of Forged metal, which allows you to use the properties of metal aura to build up your strength.
领悟了闭气之道，在敛息隐匿的状态下能够积蓄自身力量。==Having comprehended the Way of Closing Qi, you are able to build up your power while in a state of restfulness and concealment.
领悟任意一项大道天赋==Acquire a talent in any of the Great Paths
领悟剑气之道，无须利剑穿刺劈砍，用犀利的剑气亦可伤人。==Comprehending the Way of Sword Qi, one does not need a sharp sword to pierce and slash, one can use sharp sword Qi to wound others.
领悟剑走偏锋之道，一旦与人交手便能快速积攒剑气御敌。==You will be able to quickly accumulate sword energy to defend yourself against enemies once you have fought with them.

领悟引气之道，轻而易举便可操控在对手体内留下的灵气。==By comprehending the Way of Guiding Qi, one can easily manipulate the Qi left in the opponent's body.
领悟御体之道，与人对战时防御的能力得到了提升。==Comprehending the Way of the Imperial Body, the ability to defend oneself when fighting someone has been improved.
领悟火毒之道，施展法术时能使对手同时陷入中毒与灼烧的困境。==Comprehending the Way of Fire Poison, one can cast a spell that will cause the opponent to be poisoned and burned at the same time.
领悟生木之道，能够更容易的吸收天地间的木系灵气。==You have learned the Way of Wood, which allows you to absorb the wood energy of heaven and earth more easily.
领悟盘根之道，你施展的缠绕神通将更难被对手挣脱。==By understanding the Way of the Coiled Root, your entangling ability will be more difficult for your opponent to break free.
领悟自愈之道，与人对战时能够快速恢复自身伤势。==You have learned the way of self-healing and can quickly recover from your wounds when fighting against others.
领悟轻剑之道，施展轻快灵巧的剑招时威能提升。==By understanding the way of the light sword, the power of a light and dexterous sword move is increased.
领悟重剑之道，施展势大力沉的剑招时威能提升。==By understanding the Way of the Heavy Sword, the power of a powerful sword move is increased.
领悟长老传授的入门神通后，再回广场找传功长老。==After comprehending the Introductory Avatar taught by the Elder, go back to the Plaza and ask the Transmission Elder.

风中奇缘==The Wind in the Sky
风之所以消散，是因为受到山脉的阻拦。守静者，土之道也，你仰头望着厚重绵延的高山，脑海中豁然贯通，窥探到一丝土之道的法门。你将此刻的感悟记在心里，打算找个时间再细细消化。\\n思绪+1==The wind dissipates because it is blocked by the mountains. You look up at the thick, rolling mountains, and your mind opens up to a glimpse of the dharma of the earth. You commit this moment of insight to memory, intending to find time to digest it in detail. \\nThoughts+1

驱动#c449491【<hy t=影役 l=2_101_5_81 fhc=#e86524 ul=1>】#n，【生】则每个#c449491【<hy t=影役 l=2_101_5_81 fhc=#e86524 ul=1>】#n生成#c449491【<hy t=影 l=2_101_5_78 fhc=#e86524 ul=1>】#n*2；【克】则每个#c449491【<hy t=影役 l=2_101_5_81 fhc=#e86524 ul=1>】#n攻击一次。==Drive #c449491 【<hy t=Shadow Servant l=2_101_5_81 fhc=#e86524 ul=1>】#n, 【raw】 then each #c449491 【<hy t=Shadow Servant l=2_101_5_81 fhc=#e86524 ul=1>】#n generates #c449491 【<hy t=Shadow l=2_101_5_78 fhc=#e86524 ul=1>】#n*2; 【g】 then each #c449491 【<hy t=Shadow Servant l=2_101_5_81 fhc=#e86524 ul=1>】#n attacks once.

As the iron sword recovers, Wei Wuji's soul will also grow stronger, which will be beneficial for him to recover his memories from his life.

每抽取一张灵气牌，自身所有负面状态将被移除一层。==For each Aura tile drawn, all negative status will be removed.
每回合抽牌数及灵气牌上限大幅提升。==The number of cards drawn per turn and the maximum number of Aura cards are greatly increased.
漩涡余生==Maelstrom Remains
据碎星商会透漏，南崖城客栈有一位曾探访图南漩涡后存活的修士，若有空闲可以前去找她了解一下情况。==According to the Shattered Star Chamber of Commerce, there is a monk who has survived the visit to the whirlpool in South Cliff City, so if you have time, you can go to her for more information.
海底古树==Ancient tree under the sea
你与倪旭欣打听到图南海漩涡的位置之后，前往海底探索，发现并没有传说中的遗迹，只有一棵神秘的古树，静静的矗立在海底。==After you and Ni Xu Xin inquired about the location of the Tu Nanhai whirlpool, you went to the bottom of the sea to explore and found that there was no legendary relic, only a mysterious ancient tree, standing quietly on the bottom of the sea.
和倪旭欣一起从广陵城码头出海。==Together with Ni Xuxin, they left the sea from the pier of Guangling City.
培元丹与生骨丹效用相仿，尝试提升用药的品阶或数量，推演出培元丹的丹方。==Lesser Healing Elixir and Minor Healing Elixir have similar potency, try to upgrade the grade or quantity of the medicine used and deduce the recipe for Lesser Healing Elixir.
在南崖城内四处打听==Ask around in South Cliff City
前往附近岛屿寻找元婴期金鹏，取得五阶妖兽材料金鹏羽、金鹏眼、金鹏喙、金鹏腔骨各一份后回碎星商会交换情报。==Go to the nearby islands to look for the Golden Roc, get a copy of Golden Roc Feather, Golden Roc Eye, Golden Roc Beak and Golden Roc Bone, and then return to the Shattered Star Chamber of Commerce to exchange information.

意守法==Guardianship of the Will

近日收到传闻，东石谷附近有妖兽“巨猿”作祟，残害无辜百姓。此妖兽的实力与炼气后期的人类修士相当，若有道友除了这孽畜，我白帝楼必有重谢。==Recently, we have received a rumour that a demonic beast, the 'Giant Ape', is haunting the East Stone Valley and killing innocent people. The strength of this beast is comparable to that of a cultivator at the late stage of Qi refinement. If you can get rid of this evil beast, I will give you a big thank you.
近日收到传闻，永安镇附近出现了一伙山贼，经常掠夺附近村庄的财物。这些劫匪都是凡人，可有道友愿意出手？==Recently, I received a rumour that a group of mountain bandits have appeared near Yong'an Town, often plundering the belongings of nearby villages. These robbers are all mortals, is there any fellow Daoist willing to help ?
近日收到传闻，永安镇附近有妖兽“炙火蝎”作祟，残害无辜百姓。此妖兽的实力与金丹期的人类修士相当，若有道友除了这孽畜，我白帝楼必有重谢。==Recently, we have received a rumour that a demonic beast, the 'Scorching Fire Scorpion', is haunting the area around Yong'an Town, killing innocent people. Yi, often plundering the nearby villages of their belongings. 近日收到许多Near Yunshi City村民的求助，说村子里常常受到一些低阶妖兽的侵扰。可有道友愿意去村庄中镇守一段时间，助那里的凡人驱赶妖兽？==Recently, we have received many requests for help from the villagers of Near Yunshi City, saying that the village is often infested by some low-ranking demonic beasts. Are there any Daoists who are willing to go to the village for a period of time and help the mortals there to chase away the demonic beasts?
　　体内翻涌的灵气逐渐平息，原本呈气体状态下的灵气逐渐凝实液化，剩余的灵力则被肉体与经脉吸收。你只觉得全身舒畅，一种从未有过的力量感开始凝聚起来。==The spiritual energy surging in the body gradually subsided, the spiritual energy that was originally in the gas state gradually condensed and liquefied, and the remaining spiritual energy was absorbed by the body and meridians. You just feel comfortable all over, and a sense of strength that you have never had before begins to condense.
　　周边天地的灵气突然开始涌入你的体内，你感到体内的真元犹如沸腾的开水一般，迅速流动起来。灵气的波动足足持续了一个时辰才平息下来，你终于冲破瓶颈，境界提升至Early-Phase Foundation Establishment Stage==The aura from the surrounding world suddenly begins to pour into your body, and you feel the true essence in your body flowing like boiling water. The fluctuation of the aura lasted for an hour before it subsided. You finally broke through the bottleneck, and your realm was raised to the Early-Phase Foundation Establishment Stage.

冥鲲==Hades
人形金龙==Humanoid Metal Dragon

人形水龙==Humanoid Water Dragon

人形土龙==Humanoid Earth Dragon
人形灵龙==Humanoid Spirit dragon
人形暴龙==Humanoid Rage dragon
与青嫣坐而论道，交流感悟，收获颇丰。==It was very rewarding to sit and discuss with Qingyan and exchange insights.
与徐凡坐而论道，交流感悟，收获颇丰。==Sitting and discussing with Xu Fan, exchanging insights and gaining a lot
获得易伤==Obtained vulnerability
下个回合开始时，获得【易伤】*（attack）==At the beginning of the next turn, recieve 【vulnerable】*（attack）
回合开始敌方获得易伤==The enemy gains vulnerability at the start of the round
回合开始敌方获得易伤*（attack）== Enemy recieves vulnerability at the start of the round*（attack）
神威录==Divine Might Record
单次造成超过10点神识伤害时，有20%的几率使敌方获得【威压】*1==When dealing more than 10 points of Divine Sense damage in a single round, there is a 20% chance that the enemy will gain 【Powerful Pressure】*1
单次造成超过15点神识伤害时，有40%的几率使敌方获得【威压】*1==When dealing more than 10 points of Divine Sense damage in a single round, there is a 40% chance that the enemy will gain 【Powerful Pressure】*1
单次造成超过20点神识伤害时，有60%的几率使敌方获得【威压】*1==When dealing more than 10 points of Divine Sense damage in a single round, there is a 60% chance that the enemy will gain 【Powerful Pressure】*1
单次造成超过25点神识伤害时，有80%的几率使敌方获得【威压】*1==When dealing more than 10 points of Divine Sense damage in a single round, there is a 80% chance that the enemy will gain 【Powerful Pressure】*1
单次造成超过30点神识伤害时，敌方获得【威压】*1==When dealing more than 30 points of Divine Sense damage in a single instance, the enemy gains 【Power Pressure】*1
受到的伤害降低80%==80% reduction of damage taken
造成的伤害+（attack）==Damage dealt +( attack )
在凝液成丹阶段，金系灵根权重+（attack*20）==At the stage of refining into Golden Core, Gold spiritual root +（attack*20）
在凝液成丹阶段，木系灵根权重+（attack*20）==At the stage of refining into Golden Core, Wood spiritual root +（attack*20）

不知是奇宝出世还是山体崩塌，你对此十分好奇，便找了个山洞谨慎地观察着颤动的峰头。{huanhang}没过多久，大量的山灰伴随震耳欲聋的声音喷薄而出，原本覆盖着白雪的山峰顷刻便淌满了赤红的岩浆。你虽相隔一段距离，仍被这滚烫的山灰波及，一身道袍褴褛万分，只得灰头土脸地离开了。{huanhang}思绪+1==I don't know if it's a strange treasure or a mountain collapse, you're very curious about it, so you find a cave and cautiously observe the trembling peaks. {huanhang}It didn't take long for a large amount of mountain ash to spill out along with deafening sounds, and the snow-covered peaks were instantly dripping with crimson lava. [24a5d6]资质[-]决定了你的修炼速度和灵根品质，资质越高，修为增长越快，灵根也越精纯。==[24a5d6]Qualification[-] determines your cultivation speed and the quality of your spiritual roots. The higher the qualification, the faster the cultivation growth and the more pure the spiritual roots.
[24a5d6]灵根[-]决定了你在对战时能够抽到各系灵气牌的概率权重，一般来说，灵根属性越精纯越有利。==[24a5d6] Spiritual Root [-] determines the probability weighting of each system's aura tiles you can draw during matchmaking. Generally speaking, the purer the spiritual root attribute, the more favorable it is.
[24a5d6]悟性[-]是对事物的感知力，思考和洞察力。悟性数值越高，领悟法术与功法的所耗费的时间越短。==[24a5d6] Comprehension [-] is the ability to perceive, think and see things. The higher the value of perception, the shorter the time it takes to comprehend spells and feats.
[24a5d6]遁速[-]决定了你在地图上移动所消耗的时间。战斗中遁速更快的一方可以抢先出手，而只有遁速比对手高时，才可以在战斗中逃遁。==[24a5d6] Movement Speed [-] determines how long it takes you to move around the map. The faster one can take the lead in the battle, and only if you have a higher recluse speed than your opponent can you escape in the battle.
[24a5d6]神识[-]是每个修士强大灵魂所产生的力量，一般来说，神识类技能会对神识低于自己的敌人有额外的效果。==[24a5d6] Divine Sense [-] is the power generated by every cultivator's powerful soul. Generally speaking, Divine Sense class skills will have extra effects on enemies whose divine sense is lower than your own.
[24a5d6]心境[-]决定了你闭关修炼的速度，若是心境等级低于你现在的境界，则事倍功半，反之亦然。==[24a5d6]Mind[-] determines the speed of your retreat cultivation. If the mind level is lower than your current realm, you will get half the result with twice the effort, and vice versa.
[24a5d6]灵石[-]修士之间进行交易的基础货币，一般来说，越好的东西要越多的灵石。==[24a5d6]Spirit Stones[-]The base currency for transactions between cultivators, generally speaking, the better the item the more spirit stones you want.
[24a5d6]气血[-]决定了你的生命值，在战斗中若是气血耗尽便会生死道消。==[24a5d6]Lifeforce[-] determines your life value, if you run out of Qi blood in battle you will die.
[24a5d6]寿元[-]顾名思义就是你的寿命长度，一般来说不同境界的修士寿元大不相同，但也有各种天材易宝能提升人的寿元。==[24a5d6]Lifespan[-] as the name implies is the length of your life, generally speaking different realms of cultivators longevity varies greatly, but there are various heavenly materials easy treasure can enhance the longevity of people.

【后继无力】【仙胎】状态下方可使用。下一次进入【凡体】状态时，【凡性】-6==Can only be used in the state of 'Immortal'. The next time you enter the 【Mortal Body】 state, 【Mortality】 -6

竹山宗主修木系功法，是宁州五大门派之一，传承悠久，据说已有数十万年的历史了，他们目前似乎正在搭设擂台，招收<color=#00757c>练气期</color>外门弟子。==The Bamboo Mountain Sect, which majors in wood techniques, is one of the five major sects in Ning Prefecture, with a long heritage that is said to be hundreds of thousands of years old, and they seem to be currently setting up a ring to recruit <color=#00757c>qi cultivation stage</color> outer disciples.
离火门主修火系功法，是宁州五大门派之一。虽然他们从不拒绝<color=#00757c>练气期</color>的散修拜入宗门，但因为恶劣的环境，也很少有人能够在那里坚持下来。==The Off-Fire Sect majors in fire-based techniques and is one of the five major sects in Ningzhou. Although they never refuse <color=#00757c>Qi Practitioner Stage</color> casual practitioners to join the sect, few are able to persevere there because of the harsh environment.
金虹剑派主修金系功法，是宁州五大门派之一。每年金虹剑派都会举办仙资大会，招收<color=#00757c>练气期</color>外门弟子。但往往只有悟性高于常人的天才才能被门派所选中。==The Iridescent Blade Sect majored in the Golden System technique and was one of the five major sects in Ning Prefecture. Every year, the Iridescent Blade Sect would hold an Immortal Capital Conference to recruit <color=#00757c>Qi Practitioner Stage</color> outer disciples. But often only geniuses with higher-than-average Enlightening are chosen by the sect.
星河剑派主修水系功法，是宁州五大门派之一。每年星河剑派都会开启星河剑阵进行测试，招收<color=#00757c>练气期</color>外门弟子。但此门派似乎只招收资质优上的女弟子。==The Star River Sword School is one of the five major sects in Ningzhou, with its main cultivation of water-based techniques. Every year, the Star sword school opens the Star River Sword Array for testing and recruiting <color=#00757c>Qi Practitioner Stage</color> outer disciples. However, this sect seems to only admit female disciples with superior Aptitudes.
化尘教主修土系功法，是宁州五大门派之一。往常化尘教每年都会开放宗门以招收<color=#00757c>练气期</color>弟子，但近年来似乎因为某些缘故谢绝接待外客。==The Dust TransArray Cult is one of the five major sects in Ningzhou, which specializes in earth-based techniques. In the past, it used to open its doors every year to recruit <color=#00757c>Qi cultivation stage</color> disciples, but in recent years it seems to have refused to receive foreign visitors for some reason.
敖灵的求助==Ao Ling's request for help
前往东海调查陨龙之地的敖玄音信全无，但敖灵仍有一丝希望，于公于私你都需要速速前往东海调查此事。==Ao Xuan, who went to the East Sea to investigate the land of the fallen dragon, has no news, but Ao Ling still has a glimmer of hope, and for public and private reasons you need to go to the East Sea to investigate this matter quickly.
仙与鸳鸯==Immortals and mandarin ducks

道侣岂能容他人安排，你决心帮助林沐心。如今计划已定，只待时机而已矣。==How can a Daoist couple allow others to make arrangements? You are determined to help Lin Mu Xin. Now that the plan is set, you just need to wait for the right time.
前往东海打探敖玄的情报。==Go to the East China Sea to find out inArray about Ao Xuan.
找到困住敖玄的陨龙之地。==Find the place where Ao Xuan's fallen dragon is trapped.
活要见人，死要见尸。==You must see a human being alive and a corpse dead.

等待结侣典礼开始。==Wait for the ceremony to begin.

前往林府长老堂。==Go to the Lin House Elders Hall.
回客栈将消息告知林沐心==Return to the inn and tell Lin Mu Xin the news

去林府其他地方看看。==Go to the rest of the Lin Mansion.

回合开始时，受到1点火系伤害，每次触发后移除一层。==At the beginning of the round, take 1 point of fire damage and remove one level per trigger.
本回合受到的技能伤害+1==Take +1 skill damage this turn
抽牌阶段，抽牌数-1，触发后移除。==During the draw phase, -1 to the number of cards drawn, removed after the trigger.
本回合每使用一次技能，受到1点伤害==1 point of damage for each skill used this turn

回合结束时，对敌方造成1点剑系伤害，不主动移除。==At the end of the round, deal 1 point of sword damage to the enemy, not actively removed.

每累积受到10点伤害，受到2点伤害。==Takes 2 points of damage for every 10 points of damage accumulated.
元婴期鲲类海兽，五行属水，肉身强大，擅擭取周遭灵气强化自身。==The Kun-type sea beast of the first infant stage is a powerful flesh and body beast, which is good at trapping the surrounding spiritual energy to strengthen itself.
元婴期蟒类海兽，五行属金。能口吐灵雾伤敌，清除一切负面状态且回复自身==YuanYing stage python sea beast, five elements are gold. It can spit out spiritual mist to hurt the enemy, remove all negative states and restore itself.
<Title>对话</Title>\n<Image>duihua</Image>\n在对话窗口弹出后，无法进行除对话操作之外的其它操作。\n在对话中按住键盘ctrl键可快速跳过对话。==<Title>Dialogue</Title>\n<Image>duihua</Image>\nAfter the dialogue window pops up, you can't do anything other than dialogue. \nPress and hold the keyboard ctrl key during a conversation to quickly skip the conversation.
在翻看《苗矮杂记》时有所领悟。==I learned this while looking through the Miao Dwarf Miscellany.
战利品==Trophies

杨戬==Yang Jian
嫦娥==Chang'e
狼人==Wolfman
魔法球==Magic Ball
向敌人发射一枚魔法球造成（attack）点伤害==Launch a magic ball at the enemy to deal （attack） points of damage.
火球术==Fireball
发射一枚巨大的火球造成你攻击力的两倍（attack*2）点伤害==Fires a huge fireball that deals twice your attack power （attack*2） points of damage.
治疗术==Healing Spell
回复你和一名友军（attack+50）点生命值==Restores （attack+50） life points to you and a friendly soldier
穿刺==Pierce
使用长枪穿透敌人，造成（attack）点伤害==Pierce an enemy with your lance, dealing （attack） points of damage
蓄力一击==Power Up Strike
续攒力量向前攻击，造成你攻击的两倍（attack*2）伤害==Power up and attack forward, dealing twice your attack （attack*2） damage.

龙族在化龙海建有一座龙宫，但很少有人知道它确切的位置。去化龙海附近的岛屿探索一番，或是向当地的修士打探打探，应该能够得到一些有用的情报。==The Dragon Clan has built a Dragon Palace in the Sea of Transformation, but few people know its exact location. Explore the islands near the Dragon Sea or ask the local cultivators, you should be able to get some useful information.
采筠阁是蓬沙岛的情报交易组织。若是找到了有价值的<color=#00757c>古代遗物</color>，可以前往采筠阁与他们交换其它海域的情报。==The Caiyun Pavilion is the intelligence trading organization of Peng Sha Island. If you find valuable <color=#00757c>ancient relics</color>, you can go to Caiyun Pavilion and exchange information about other seas with them.
东海之底==Bottom of the East Sea
因上古大阵而沉没于东海之底的上古龙宫，近期的种种迹象表明即将出现，敖玄拜托你找到上古龙宫并一探究竟，帮助龙族找回遗失的秘宝和传承。==The ancient dragon palace that sank at the bottom of the East Sea due to the ancient formation has recently shown signs that it is about to appear. Ao Xuan asks you to find the ancient dragon palace and explore it to help the dragon tribe recover the lost secret treasures and heritage.
星冲生魔==Star Rush Demon
林沐心传音来信说需要你的帮助，也未在传音符中说明是什么事，有空还是去林府一趟吧。==Lin Mu Xin has sent a letter saying that he needs your help, but he has not specified what it is in the message, so please go to the Lin Palace when you have time.
九霄之魂==Spirit of the Nine Heavens
上古龙皇九霄应神魂过于强大不能离开九霄雷狱阵，需要你前往化龙池寻得龙魂石。==The ancient dragon emperor Jiu Xiao should be too powerful soul can not leave the nine heavenly thunder prison formation, you need to go to the dragon pond to find the dragon soul stone.
据闻，上古龙宫虽是沉于东海海底，但每隔百年<color=#00757c>龙宫的残垣断壁</color>常会上浮至海面，其中凶险异常，故而海上称之为<color=#00757c>陨龙之地</color>。==It is said that although the ancient Dragon Palace is sunken at the bottom of the East Sea, every hundred years <color=#00757c>the remnants of the Dragon Palace</color> will often float to the surface, which is exceptionally dangerous, so the sea is called <color=#00757c>the land of the fallen dragon</color>.
前往东海，向海上的修士打探敖玄的情报。==Go to the East Sea and ask the monks at sea for information about Ao Xuan.
前往东海西北角，找到困住敖玄的陨龙之地。==Go to the northwest corner of the East Sea and find the Land of the Meteoric Dragon that trapped Ao Xuan.
前往天星城林府与倪旭欣会合。==Travel to the Lin Mansion in Tianxing City to meet up with Ni Xu Xin.
前往东海搜寻上古龙宫的线索。（探明陨龙之地、向人打探等行为都可增加海域探索度）==Go to the East Sea to search for clues about the ancient Dragon Palace. （Actions such as discovering the Land of the Fallen Dragon and asking people for information can increase the sea exploration degree）
找到并进入上古龙宫。==Find and enter the Ancient Dragon Palace.
探明并寻获上古龙宫的所有上古之物。==Find out and find all the ancient things in the Ancient Dragon Palace.
回去化龙海龙宫汇报情况并归还龙族秘宝。==Go back to the Dragon Palace in the Sea of Dragonization to report the situation and return the secret treasures of the Dragon Clan.
前往星宫。==Go to the Star Palace.
去天星城逛逛。==Go to the Heavenly Star City for a stroll.
前往云汐城公孙府。==Go to the Gongsun Mansion in Yun Shi City.
前往九嶷山寻找叛逃的风雨楼杀手。==Go to Jiuyi Mountain to look for the renegade Wind and Rain House assassins.
回公孙家复命。==Go back to the Gongsun House to return to your orders.
回林家客房给星铃儿送酒。==Go back to the Lin family guest room to give wine to Star Bell.
回到林家。==Return to the Lin family.
前往林家长老堂。==Go to the Lin Family Elders Hall.
前往上古龙宫的化龙池寻找龙魂石。==Go to the Dragon Pond in the Ancient Dragon Palace to look for the Dragon Soul Stone.
回九霄雷狱阵找九霄。==Go back to Ninth Heaven Thunder Prison Formation to find Ninth Heaven.

每回合获得灵气牌的数量+1，最多提升10。==Gain +1 to the number of Aura tiles per turn, up to a maximum of 10.

在研究黑岩大阵所铭刻的纹路时，对阵道有了一些新的感悟。==While studying the patterns inscribed on the Great Black Rock Formation, gained some new insights into the Dao of Formation.
